data AWSAccount

-- | The email address associated with the specified Amazon Web Services
--   account.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentEvidenceFolder

-- | The folder in which Audit Manager stores evidence for an assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentEvidenceFolder</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentEvidenceFolder
AssessmentEvidenceFolder' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> AssessmentEvidenceFolder

-- | The total number of issues that were reported directly from Security
--   Hub, Config, or both.
[$sel:evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The identifier for the control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The total count of evidence included in the assessment report.
[$sel:assessmentReportSelectionCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The total amount of evidence in the evidence folder.
[$sel:totalEvidence:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The number of evidence that falls under the manual category. This
--   evidence is imported manually.
[$sel:evidenceByTypeManualCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The date when the first evidence was added to the evidence folder.
[$sel:date:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The name of the specified evidence folder.
[$sel:name:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The number of evidence that falls under the user activity category.
--   This evidence is collected from CloudTrail logs.
[$sel:evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The unique identifier for the specified control.
[$sel:controlId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The total number of Amazon Web Services resources assessed to generate
--   the evidence.
[$sel:evidenceAwsServiceSourceCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

[$sel:author:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.
[$sel:id:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Service from which the evidence was collected.
[$sel:dataSource:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the control.
[$sel:controlName:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

-- | The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category.
--   This evidence is collected from Config or Security Hub.
[$sel:evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Int

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'] :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder -> Maybe Text

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentReportMetadata

-- | The metadata objects associated with the specified assessment report.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentReportMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentReportMetadata
AssessmentReportMetadata' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe AssessmentReportStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentReportMetadata

-- | Specifies when the assessment report was created.
[$sel:creationTime:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the assessment report.
[$sel:status:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe AssessmentReportStatus

-- | The name of the assessment report.
[$sel:name:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the user who created the assessment report.
[$sel:author:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the assessment report.
[$sel:id:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified assessment report.
[$sel:description:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:AssessmentReportMetadata'] :: AssessmentReportMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentReportMetadata</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the
--   assessment report was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_status</a> - The current status of the
--   assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_name</a> - The name of the assessment
--   report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:author:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_author</a> - The name of the user who
--   created the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_id</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_assessmentId</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the associated assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_description</a> - The description of the
--   specified assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:AssessmentReportMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReportMetadata_assessmentName</a> - The name of the
--   associated assessment.
newAssessmentReportMetadata :: AssessmentReportMetadata

-- | Specifies when the assessment report was created.
assessmentReportMetadata_creationTime :: Lens' AssessmentReportMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the assessment report.
assessmentReportMetadata_status :: Lens' AssessmentReportMetadata (Maybe AssessmentReportStatus)

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentReport

-- | A finalized document generated from an Audit Manager assessment. These
--   reports summarize the relevant evidence collected for your audit, and
--   link to the relevant evidence folders which are named and organized
--   according to the controls specified in your assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentReport</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentReport
AssessmentReport' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe AssessmentReportStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentReport

-- | Specifies when the assessment report was created.
[$sel:creationTime:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the specified assessment report.
[$sel:status:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe AssessmentReportStatus

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
[$sel:awsAccountId:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The name given to the assessment report.
[$sel:name:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the user who created the assessment report.
[$sel:author:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment report.
[$sel:id:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified assessment report.
[$sel:description:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:AssessmentReport'] :: AssessmentReport -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentReport</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the assessment
--   report was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_status</a> -
--   The current status of the specified assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccountId:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_awsAccountId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_name</a> - The
--   name given to the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:author:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_author</a> -
--   The name of the user who created the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the specified assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_description</a> - The description of the specified
--   assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newAssessmentReport :: AssessmentReport

-- | Specifies when the assessment report was created.
assessmentReport_creationTime :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the specified assessment report.
assessmentReport_status :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe AssessmentReportStatus)

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
assessmentReport_awsAccountId :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The name given to the assessment report.
assessmentReport_name :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the user who created the assessment report.
assessmentReport_author :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment report.
assessmentReport_id :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
assessmentReport_assessmentId :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified assessment report.
assessmentReport_description :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
assessmentReport_assessmentName :: Lens' AssessmentReport (Maybe Text)

instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentReport.AssessmentReport

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError

-- | An error entity for the <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt>
--   API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple
--   string message.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newBatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError</a> smart
--   constructor.
data BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError

-- | The identifier for the specified delegation.
[$sel:delegationId:BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError'] :: BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError -> Maybe Text

-- | The error code returned by the
--   <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt> API.
[$sel:errorCode:BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError'] :: BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError -> Maybe Text

-- | The error message returned by the
--   <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt> API.
[$sel:errorMessage:BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError'] :: BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.

--   code returned by the <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt> API.
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorMessage:BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError'</a>,
--   <a>batchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError_errorMessage</a> - The error
--   message returned by the <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt>
--   API.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlComment

-- | A comment posted by a user on a control. This includes the author's
--   name, the comment text, and a timestamp.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlComment</a> smart constructor.
data ControlComment
ControlComment' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> ControlComment

-- | The name of the user who authored the comment.
[$sel:authorName:ControlComment'] :: ControlComment -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the comment was posted.
[$sel:postedDate:ControlComment'] :: ControlComment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The body text of a control comment.
[$sel:commentBody:ControlComment'] :: ControlComment -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ControlComment</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:authorName:ControlComment'</a>,
--   <a>controlComment_authorName</a> - The name of the user who authored
--   the comment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:postedDate:ControlComment'</a>,
--   <a>controlComment_postedDate</a> - The time when the comment was
--   posted.
--   
--   <a>$sel:commentBody:ControlComment'</a>,
--   <a>controlComment_commentBody</a> - The body text of a control
--   comment.
newControlComment :: ControlComment

-- | The name of the user who authored the comment.
controlComment_authorName :: Lens' ControlComment (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the comment was posted.
controlComment_postedDate :: Lens' ControlComment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The body text of a control comment.
controlComment_commentBody :: Lens' ControlComment (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlComment.ControlComment
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlComment.ControlComment

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlMetadata

-- | The metadata associated with the specified standard or custom control.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data ControlMetadata
ControlMetadata' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ControlMetadata

-- | Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedAt:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.
[$sel:arn:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the control was created.
[$sel:createdAt:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
[$sel:controlSources:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified control.
[$sel:name:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified control.
[$sel:id:ControlMetadata'] :: ControlMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ControlMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:ControlMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>controlMetadata_lastUpdatedAt</a> - Specifies when the control was
--   most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:ControlMetadata'</a>, <a>controlMetadata_arn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:ControlMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>controlMetadata_createdAt</a> - Specifies when the control was
--   created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:ControlMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>controlMetadata_controlSources</a> - The data source that
--   determines from where Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ControlMetadata'</a>, <a>controlMetadata_name</a> - The
--   name of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ControlMetadata'</a>, <a>controlMetadata_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the specified control.
newControlMetadata :: ControlMetadata

-- | Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
controlMetadata_lastUpdatedAt :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.
controlMetadata_arn :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the control was created.
controlMetadata_createdAt :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
controlMetadata_controlSources :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified control.
controlMetadata_name :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified control.
controlMetadata_id :: Lens' ControlMetadata (Maybe Text)

instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlMetadata.ControlMetadata

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Headers.ToHeader Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus
instance Amazonka.Data.Log.ToLog Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus

instance Amazonka.Data.Text.FromText Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlStatus.ControlStatus

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl

-- | The control entity that represents a standard or custom control used
--   in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentControl</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentControl
AssessmentControl' :: Maybe ControlStatus -> Maybe Int -> Maybe ControlResponse -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [ControlComment] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentControl

-- | The status of the specified control.
[$sel:status:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe ControlStatus

-- | The amount of evidence generated for the control.
[$sel:evidenceCount:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe Int

-- | The response of the specified control.
[$sel:response:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe ControlResponse

-- | The name of the specified control.
[$sel:name:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified control.
[$sel:id:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of data sources for the specified evidence.
[$sel:evidenceSources:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The list of comments attached to the specified control.
[$sel:comments:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe [ControlComment]

-- | The amount of evidence in the assessment report.
[$sel:assessmentReportEvidenceCount:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe Int

-- | The description of the specified control.
[$sel:description:AssessmentControl'] :: AssessmentControl -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentControl</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentControl'</a>, <a>assessmentControl_status</a>
--   - The status of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceCount:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_evidenceCount</a> - The amount of evidence
--   generated for the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:response:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_response</a> - The response of the specified
--   control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentControl'</a>, <a>assessmentControl_name</a> -
--   The name of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentControl'</a>, <a>assessmentControl_id</a> - The
--   identifier for the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceSources:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_evidenceSources</a> - The list of data sources
--   for the specified evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comments:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_comments</a> - The list of comments attached to
--   the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportEvidenceCount:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_assessmentReportEvidenceCount</a> - The amount of
--   evidence in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_description</a> - The description of the
--   specified control.
newAssessmentControl :: AssessmentControl

-- | The status of the specified control.
assessmentControl_status :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe ControlStatus)

-- | The amount of evidence generated for the control.
assessmentControl_evidenceCount :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe Int)

-- | The response of the specified control.
assessmentControl_response :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe ControlResponse)

-- | The name of the specified control.
assessmentControl_name :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified control.
assessmentControl_id :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of data sources for the specified evidence.
assessmentControl_evidenceSources :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe [Text])

-- | The list of comments attached to the specified control.
assessmentControl_comments :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe [ControlComment])

-- | The amount of evidence in the assessment report.
assessmentControl_assessmentReportEvidenceCount :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe Int)

-- | The description of the specified control.
assessmentControl_description :: Lens' AssessmentControl (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl.AssessmentControl
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl.AssessmentControl
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl.AssessmentControl
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl.AssessmentControl
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControl.AssessmentControl

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | A <tt>controlSet</tt> entity that represents a collection of controls
--   in Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> smart
--   constructor.
data CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet
CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet' :: Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl) -> Text -> CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | The list of controls within the control set. This does not contain the
--   control set ID.
[$sel:controls:CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl)

-- | The name of the specified control set.
[$sel:name:CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <a>createAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_controls</a> - The list of
--   controls within the control set. This does not contain the control set
--   ID.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>createAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified control set.
newCreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet :: Text -> CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | The list of controls within the control set. This does not contain the
--   control set ID.
createAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_controls :: Lens' CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet (Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl))

-- | The name of the specified control set.
createAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name :: Lens' CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet Text

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.DelegationMetadata

-- | The metadata associated with the specified delegation.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDelegationMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data DelegationMetadata
DelegationMetadata' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe DelegationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> DelegationMetadata

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
[$sel:creationTime:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the delgation.
[$sel:status:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe DelegationStatus

-- | Specifies the name of the control set delegated for review.
[$sel:controlSetName:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
[$sel:id:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DelegationMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the delegation
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_status</a> - The current status of the
--   delgation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetName:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_controlSetName</a> - Specifies the name of the
--   control set delegated for review.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:DelegationMetadata'</a>, <a>delegationMetadata_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_assessmentId</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the IAM role.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegationMetadata :: DelegationMetadata

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
delegationMetadata_creationTime :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the delgation.
delegationMetadata_status :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe DelegationStatus)

-- | Specifies the name of the control set delegated for review.
delegationMetadata_controlSetName :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
delegationMetadata_id :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment.
delegationMetadata_assessmentId :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
delegationMetadata_roleArn :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
delegationMetadata_assessmentName :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.FrameworkMetadata

-- | The metadata of a framework, such as the name, ID, description, and so
--   on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFrameworkMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data FrameworkMetadata
FrameworkMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> FrameworkMetadata

-- | The name of the framework.
[$sel:name:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The compliance standard associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS
--   or HIPAA.
[$sel:complianceType:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
[$sel:logo:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the framework.

--   omitted.
--

--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_name</a> -
--   The name of the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_complianceType</a> - The compliance standard
--   associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_logo</a> -
--   The logo associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_description</a> - The description of the
--   framework.
newFrameworkMetadata :: FrameworkMetadata

--   or HIPAA.

-- | The description of the framework.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata

-- | The metadata associated with a standard or custom framework.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentFrameworkMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
AssessmentFrameworkMetadata' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe FrameworkType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentFrameworkMetadata

-- | The number of controls associated with the specified framework.
[$sel:controlsCount:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Int

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedAt:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
[$sel:createdAt:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The name of the specified framework.
[$sel:name:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
[$sel:complianceType:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The number of control sets associated with the specified framework.
[$sel:controlSetsCount:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Int

-- | The unique identified for the specified framework.
[$sel:id:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The framework type, such as standard or custom.
[$sel:type':AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe FrameworkType

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
[$sel:logo:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified framework.
[$sel:description:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'] :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentFrameworkMetadata</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlsCount:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_controlsCount</a> - The number of
--   controls associated with the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_lastUpdatedAt</a> - Specifies when the
--   framework was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_createdAt</a> - Specifies when the
--   framework was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_name</a> - The name of the specified
--   framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_complianceType</a> - The compliance
--   type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetsCount:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_controlSetsCount</a> - The number of
--   control sets associated with the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_id</a> - The unique identified for the
--   specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_type</a> - The framework type, such as
--   standard or custom.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_logo</a> - The logo associated with the
--   framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentFrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFrameworkMetadata_description</a> - The description of
--   the specified framework.
newAssessmentFrameworkMetadata :: AssessmentFrameworkMetadata

-- | The number of controls associated with the specified framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_controlsCount :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Int)

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_lastUpdatedAt :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_arn :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_createdAt :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The name of the specified framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_name :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_complianceType :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of control sets associated with the specified framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_controlSetsCount :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Int)

-- | The unique identified for the specified framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_id :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The framework type, such as standard or custom.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_type :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe FrameworkType)

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_logo :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified framework.
assessmentFrameworkMetadata_description :: Lens' AssessmentFrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.AssessmentFrameworkMetadata

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ManualEvidence

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newManualEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data ManualEvidence

-- | The Amazon S3 URL that points to a manual evidence object.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError

-- | An error entity for the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API. This is used to
--   provide more meaningful errors than a simple string message.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newBatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError</a>
--   smart constructor.
data BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ManualEvidence -> BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError

-- | The error code returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
[$sel:errorCode:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'] :: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError -> Maybe Text

-- | The error message returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
[$sel:errorMessage:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'] :: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError -> Maybe Text

-- | Manual evidence that cannot be collected automatically by Audit
--   Manager.
[$sel:manualEvidence:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'] :: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError -> Maybe ManualEvidence

-- | Create a value of <a>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorCode:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'</a>,
--   <a>batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_errorCode</a> - The
--   error code returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorMessage:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'</a>,
--   <a>batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_errorMessage</a> - The
--   error message returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:manualEvidence:BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError'</a>,
--   <a>batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_manualEvidence</a> -
--   Manual evidence that cannot be collected automatically by Audit
--   Manager.
newBatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError :: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError

-- | The error code returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_errorCode :: Lens' BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError (Maybe Text)

-- | The error message returned by the
--   <tt>BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl</tt> API.
batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_errorMessage :: Lens' BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError (Maybe Text)

-- | Manual evidence that cannot be collected automatically by Audit
--   Manager.
batchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError_manualEvidence :: Lens' BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError (Maybe ManualEvidence)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError.BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification

-- | The notification used to inform a user of an update in Audit Manager.
--   For example, this includes the notification that is sent when a
--   control set is delegated for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNotification</a> smart constructor.
data Notification
Notification' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Notification

-- | Specifies the name of the control set that the notification is about.
[$sel:controlSetName:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the notification was sent.
[$sel:eventTime:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The sender of the notification.
[$sel:source:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the notification.
[$sel:id:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the notification.
[$sel:description:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the related assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Notification</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetName</a> - Specifies the name of the control
--   set that the notification is about.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventTime:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_eventTime</a> -
--   The time when the notification was sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_source</a> - The
--   sender of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_description</a>
--   - The description of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentName</a> - The name of the related
--   assessment.
newNotification :: Notification

-- | Specifies the name of the control set that the notification is about.
notification_controlSetName :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified control set.
notification_controlSetId :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the notification was sent.
notification_eventTime :: Lens' Notification (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The sender of the notification.
notification_source :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the notification.
notification_id :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
notification_assessmentId :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the notification.
notification_description :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the related assessment.
notification_assessmentName :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Notification.Notification


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ObjectTypeEnum

ObjectTypeEnum' :: Text -> ObjectTypeEnum
[fromObjectTypeEnum] :: ObjectTypeEnum -> Text
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_ASSESSMENT :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_ASSESSMENT_REPORT :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_CONTROL :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_CONTROL_SET :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_DELEGATION :: ObjectTypeEnum

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ObjectTypeEnum.ObjectTypeEnum
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ObjectTypeEnum.ObjectTypeEnum

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog

-- | The record of a change within Audit Manager, such as a modified
--   assessment, a delegated control set, and so on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newChangeLog</a> smart constructor.
data ChangeLog
ChangeLog' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ObjectTypeEnum -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ActionEnum -> ChangeLog

-- | The name of the changelog object.
[$sel:objectName:ChangeLog'] :: ChangeLog -> Maybe Text

-- | The time of creation for the changelog object.
[$sel:createdAt:ChangeLog'] :: ChangeLog -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The changelog object type, such as an assessment, control, or control
--   set.
[$sel:objectType:ChangeLog'] :: ChangeLog -> Maybe ObjectTypeEnum

-- | The IAM user or role that performed the action.
[$sel:createdBy:ChangeLog'] :: ChangeLog -> Maybe Text

-- | The action performed.
[$sel:action:ChangeLog'] :: ChangeLog -> Maybe ActionEnum

-- | Create a value of <a>ChangeLog</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectName:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_objectName</a> - The
--   name of the changelog object.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_createdAt</a> - The
--   time of creation for the changelog object.
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectType:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_objectType</a> - The
--   changelog object type, such as an assessment, control, or control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that performed the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:action:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_action</a> - The action
--   performed.
newChangeLog :: ChangeLog

-- | The name of the changelog object.
changeLog_objectName :: Lens' ChangeLog (Maybe Text)

-- | The time of creation for the changelog object.
changeLog_createdAt :: Lens' ChangeLog (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The changelog object type, such as an assessment, control, or control
--   set.
changeLog_objectType :: Lens' ChangeLog (Maybe ObjectTypeEnum)

-- | The IAM user or role that performed the action.
changeLog_createdBy :: Lens' ChangeLog (Maybe Text)

-- | The action performed.
changeLog_action :: Lens' ChangeLog (Maybe ActionEnum)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ChangeLog.ChangeLog


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource

-- | A system asset that is evaluated in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.
data Resource
Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Resource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
[$sel:arn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The value of the specified resource.
[$sel:value:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_value</a> - The value of the
--   specified resource.
newResource :: Resource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
resource_arn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The value of the specified resource.
resource_value :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Resource.Resource


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence

-- | A record that contains the information needed to demonstrate
--   compliance with the requirements specified by a control. Examples of
--   evidence include change activity triggered by a user, or a system
--   configuration snapshot.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data Evidence
Evidence' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Resource] -> Maybe Text -> Evidence

-- | The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.
[$sel:time:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.
[$sel:assessmentReportSelection:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The type of automated evidence.
[$sel:evidenceByType:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
[$sel:complianceCheck:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is collected,
--   and its organization path.
[$sel:awsOrganization:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
[$sel:awsAccountId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The names and values used by the evidence event, including an
--   attribute name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value
--   (such as <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
[$sel:attributes:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
[$sel:evidenceAwsAccountId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the evidence.
[$sel:id:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
[$sel:dataSource:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.
[$sel:evidenceFolderId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the
--   evidence.
[$sel:iamId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified evidence event.
[$sel:eventName:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.
[$sel:resourcesIncluded:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe [Resource]

-- | The Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
[$sel:eventSource:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Evidence</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:time:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_time</a> - The timestamp that
--   represents when the evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportSelection:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_assessmentReportSelection</a> - Specifies whether the
--   evidence is included in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByType:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_evidenceByType</a> -
--   The type of automated evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceCheck:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_complianceCheck</a>
--   - The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsOrganization:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsOrganization</a>
--   - The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is
--   collected, and its organization path.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccountId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsAccountId</a> - The
--   identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_attributes</a> - The
--   names and values used by the evidence event, including an attribute
--   name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value (such as
--   <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceAwsAccountId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceAwsAccountId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_id</a> - The identifier for the
--   evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_dataSource</a> - The
--   data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceFolderId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceFolderId</a> - The identifier for the folder in
--   which the evidence is stored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iamId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_iamId</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventName:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventName</a> - The name
--   of the specified evidence event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourcesIncluded:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_resourcesIncluded</a> - The list of resources assessed to
--   generate the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventSource</a> - The
--   Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
newEvidence :: Evidence

-- | The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.
evidence_time :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.
evidence_assessmentReportSelection :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The type of automated evidence.
evidence_evidenceByType :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
evidence_complianceCheck :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is collected,
--   and its organization path.
evidence_awsOrganization :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
evidence_awsAccountId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The names and values used by the evidence event, including an
--   attribute name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value
--   (such as <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
evidence_attributes :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
evidence_evidenceAwsAccountId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the evidence.
evidence_id :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
evidence_dataSource :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.
evidence_evidenceFolderId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the
--   evidence.
evidence_iamId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified evidence event.
evidence_eventName :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.
evidence_resourcesIncluded :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe [Resource])

-- | The Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
evidence_eventSource :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Evidence.Evidence


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType
newtype RoleType
RoleType' :: Text -> RoleType
[fromRoleType] :: RoleType -> Text
pattern RoleType_PROCESS_OWNER :: RoleType
pattern RoleType_RESOURCE_OWNER :: RoleType
instance Amazonka.Data.XML.ToXML Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Amazonka.Data.XML.FromXML Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Amazonka.Data.Headers.ToHeader Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance Amazonka.Data.Log.ToLog Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType

instance Amazonka.Data.Text.FromText Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
