instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.RoleType.RoleType


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role

-- | The wrapper that contains the Audit Manager role information of the
--   current user, such as the role type and IAM Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN).
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRole</a> smart constructor.
data Role
Role' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe Text -> Role

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
[$sel:roleType:Role'] :: Role -> Maybe RoleType

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:Role'] :: Role -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Role</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleType</a> - The type of
--   customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
newRole :: Role

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
role_roleType :: Lens' Role (Maybe RoleType)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
role_roleArn :: Lens' Role (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Role.Role


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation

-- | The assignment of a control set to a delegate for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDelegation</a> smart constructor.
data Delegation
Delegation' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe DelegationStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Delegation

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
[$sel:roleType:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe RoleType

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
[$sel:creationTime:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the delegation.
[$sel:status:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe DelegationStatus

-- | Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdated:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The identifier for the associated control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The IAM user or role that created the delegation.
[$sel:createdBy:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
[$sel:id:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The comment related to the delegation.
[$sel:comment:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Delegation</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleType</a> - The
--   type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_creationTime</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_status</a> - The status
--   of the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdated:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_lastUpdated</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_controlSetId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_createdBy</a> - The
--   IAM user or role that created the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_assessmentId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comment:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_comment</a> - The
--   comment related to the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Delegation'</a>,
--   <a>delegation_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegation :: Delegation

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
delegation_roleType :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe RoleType)

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
delegation_creationTime :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the delegation.
delegation_status :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe DelegationStatus)

-- | Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
delegation_lastUpdated :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The identifier for the associated control set.
delegation_controlSetId :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The IAM user or role that created the delegation.
delegation_createdBy :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
delegation_id :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the associated assessment.
delegation_assessmentId :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The comment related to the delegation.
delegation_comment :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
delegation_roleArn :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
delegation_assessmentName :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Delegation.Delegation


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem

-- | A metadata object associated with an assessment in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentMetadataItem</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentMetadataItem
AssessmentMetadataItem' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe AssessmentStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe [Delegation] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentMetadataItem

-- | Specifies when the assessment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the assessment.
[$sel:status:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe AssessmentStatus

-- | The time of the most recent update.
[$sel:lastUpdated:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The roles associated with the assessment.
[$sel:roles:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe [Role]

-- | The delegations associated with the assessment.
[$sel:delegations:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe [Delegation]

-- | The name of the assessment.
[$sel:name:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the compliance standard related to the assessment, such as
--   PCI-DSS.
[$sel:complianceType:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the assessment.
[$sel:id:AssessmentMetadataItem'] :: AssessmentMetadataItem -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentMetadataItem</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the
--   assessment was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_status</a> - The current status of the
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdated:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_lastUpdated</a> - The time of the most
--   recent update.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roles:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_roles</a> - The roles associated with the
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:delegations:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_delegations</a> - The delegations associated
--   with the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_name</a> - The name of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_complianceType</a> - The name of the
--   compliance standard related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentMetadataItem'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadataItem_id</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   assessment.
newAssessmentMetadataItem :: AssessmentMetadataItem

-- | Specifies when the assessment was created.
assessmentMetadataItem_creationTime :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the assessment.
assessmentMetadataItem_status :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe AssessmentStatus)

-- | The time of the most recent update.
assessmentMetadataItem_lastUpdated :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The roles associated with the assessment.
assessmentMetadataItem_roles :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe [Role])

-- | The delegations associated with the assessment.
assessmentMetadataItem_delegations :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe [Delegation])

-- | The name of the assessment.
assessmentMetadataItem_name :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the compliance standard related to the assessment, such as
--   PCI-DSS.
assessmentMetadataItem_complianceType :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the assessment.
assessmentMetadataItem_id :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadataItem.AssessmentMetadataItem


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet

-- | Represents a set of controls in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentControlSet</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentControlSet
AssessmentControlSet' :: Maybe ControlSetStatus -> Maybe [AssessmentControl] -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe [Delegation] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentControlSet

-- | Specifies the current status of the control set.
[$sel:status:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe ControlSetStatus

-- | The list of controls contained with the control set.
[$sel:controls:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe [AssessmentControl]

-- | The roles associated with the control set.
[$sel:roles:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe [Role]

-- | The total number of evidence objects uploaded manually to the control
--   set.
[$sel:manualEvidenceCount:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe Int

-- | The delegations associated with the control set.
[$sel:delegations:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe [Delegation]

-- | The total number of evidence objects retrieved automatically for the
--   control set.
[$sel:systemEvidenceCount:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe Int

-- | The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
[$sel:id:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe Text

-- | The description for the control set.
[$sel:description:AssessmentControlSet'] :: AssessmentControlSet -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentControlSet</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_status</a> - Specifies the current status of
--   the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controls:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_controls</a> - The list of controls contained
--   with the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roles:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_roles</a> - The roles associated with the
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:manualEvidenceCount:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_manualEvidenceCount</a> - The total number of
--   evidence objects uploaded manually to the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:delegations:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_delegations</a> - The delegations associated
--   with the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:systemEvidenceCount:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_systemEvidenceCount</a> - The total number of
--   evidence objects retrieved automatically for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentControlSet'</a>, <a>assessmentControlSet_id</a> -
--   The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_description</a> - The description for the
--   control set.
newAssessmentControlSet :: AssessmentControlSet

-- | Specifies the current status of the control set.
assessmentControlSet_status :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe ControlSetStatus)

-- | The list of controls contained with the control set.
assessmentControlSet_controls :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe [AssessmentControl])

-- | The roles associated with the control set.
assessmentControlSet_roles :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe [Role])

-- | The total number of evidence objects uploaded manually to the control
--   set.
assessmentControlSet_manualEvidenceCount :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe Int)

-- | The delegations associated with the control set.
assessmentControlSet_delegations :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe [Delegation])

-- | The total number of evidence objects retrieved automatically for the
--   control set.
assessmentControlSet_systemEvidenceCount :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe Int)

-- | The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
assessmentControlSet_id :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe Text)

-- | The description for the control set.
assessmentControlSet_description :: Lens' AssessmentControlSet (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentControlSet.AssessmentControlSet


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework

-- | The file used to structure and automate Audit Manager assessments for
--   a given compliance standard.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentFramework</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentFramework
AssessmentFramework' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [AssessmentControlSet] -> Maybe FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentFramework

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
[$sel:arn:AssessmentFramework'] :: AssessmentFramework -> Maybe Text

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
[$sel:controlSets:AssessmentFramework'] :: AssessmentFramework -> Maybe [AssessmentControlSet]
[$sel:metadata:AssessmentFramework'] :: AssessmentFramework -> Maybe FrameworkMetadata

-- | The unique identifier for the framework.
[$sel:id:AssessmentFramework'] :: AssessmentFramework -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentFramework</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssessmentFramework'</a>, <a>assessmentFramework_arn</a> -
--   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSets:AssessmentFramework'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFramework_controlSets</a> - The control sets associated
--   with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:AssessmentFramework'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFramework_metadata</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentFramework'</a>, <a>assessmentFramework_id</a> -
--   The unique identifier for the framework.
newAssessmentFramework :: AssessmentFramework

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
assessmentFramework_arn :: Lens' AssessmentFramework (Maybe Text)

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
assessmentFramework_controlSets :: Lens' AssessmentFramework (Maybe [AssessmentControlSet])

-- | Undocumented member.
assessmentFramework_metadata :: Lens' AssessmentFramework (Maybe FrameworkMetadata)

-- | The unique identifier for the framework.
assessmentFramework_id :: Lens' AssessmentFramework (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentFramework.AssessmentFramework


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateDelegationRequest

-- | A collection of attributes used to create a delegation for an
--   assessment in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateDelegationRequest</a> smart constructor.
data CreateDelegationRequest
CreateDelegationRequest' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> CreateDelegationRequest

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
[$sel:roleType:CreateDelegationRequest'] :: CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe RoleType

-- | The unique identifier for the control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:CreateDelegationRequest'] :: CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe Text

-- | A comment related to the delegation request.
[$sel:comment:CreateDelegationRequest'] :: CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:CreateDelegationRequest'] :: CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateDelegationRequest</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_roleType</a> - The type of customer
--   persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_controlSetId</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comment:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_comment</a> - A comment related to the
--   delegation request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the IAM role.
newCreateDelegationRequest :: CreateDelegationRequest

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
createDelegationRequest_roleType :: Lens' CreateDelegationRequest (Maybe RoleType)

-- | The unique identifier for the control set.
createDelegationRequest_controlSetId :: Lens' CreateDelegationRequest (Maybe Text)

-- | A comment related to the delegation request.
createDelegationRequest_comment :: Lens' CreateDelegationRequest (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
createDelegationRequest_roleArn :: Lens' CreateDelegationRequest (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateDelegationRequest.CreateDelegationRequest
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateDelegationRequest.CreateDelegationRequest
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateDelegationRequest.CreateDelegationRequest
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateDelegationRequest.CreateDelegationRequest

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError

--   API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple
--   string message.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newBatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError</a> smart
--   constructor.

BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError' :: Maybe CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError

-- | The API request to batch create delegations in Audit Manager.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Scope

-- | The wrapper that contains the Amazon Web Services accounts and
--   services in scope for the assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScope</a> smart constructor.
data Scope
Scope' :: Maybe [AWSAccount] -> Maybe [AWSService] -> Scope

-- | The Amazon Web Services accounts included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
[$sel:awsAccounts:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe [AWSAccount]

-- | The Amazon Web Services services included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
[$sel:awsServices:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe [AWSService]

-- | Create a value of <a>Scope</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccounts:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsAccounts</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services accounts included in the scope of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsServices:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsServices</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services services included in the scope of the assessment.
newScope :: Scope

-- | The Amazon Web Services accounts included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
scope_awsAccounts :: Lens' Scope (Maybe [AWSAccount])

-- | The Amazon Web Services services included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
scope_awsServices :: Lens' Scope (Maybe [AWSService])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Scope.Scope
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Scope.Scope
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Scope.Scope

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata

-- | The metadata associated with the specified assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentMetadata
AssessmentMetadata' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe AssessmentStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe [Delegation] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination -> Maybe Scope -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentMetadata

-- | Specifies when the assessment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The overall status of the assessment.
[$sel:status:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe AssessmentStatus

-- | The time of the most recent update.
[$sel:lastUpdated:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The roles associated with the assessment.
[$sel:roles:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe [Role]

-- | The delegations associated with the assessment.
[$sel:delegations:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe [Delegation]

-- | The name of the assessment.
[$sel:name:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The destination in which evidence reports are stored for the specified
--   assessment.
[$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination

-- | The wrapper of Amazon Web Services accounts and services in scope for
--   the assessment.
[$sel:scope:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe Scope

-- | The name of a compliance standard related to the assessment, such as
--   PCI-DSS.
[$sel:complianceType:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the assessment.
[$sel:id:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the assessment.
[$sel:description:AssessmentMetadata'] :: AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the assessment
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_status</a> - The overall status of the
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdated:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_lastUpdated</a> - The time of the most recent
--   update.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roles:AssessmentMetadata'</a>, <a>assessmentMetadata_roles</a>
--   - The roles associated with the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:delegations:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_delegations</a> - The delegations associated
--   with the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentMetadata'</a>, <a>assessmentMetadata_name</a> -
--   The name of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_assessmentReportsDestination</a> - The
--   destination in which evidence reports are stored for the specified
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scope:AssessmentMetadata'</a>, <a>assessmentMetadata_scope</a>
--   - The wrapper of Amazon Web Services accounts and services in scope
--   for the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_complianceType</a> - The name of a compliance
--   standard related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentMetadata'</a>, <a>assessmentMetadata_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentMetadata_description</a> - The description of the
--   assessment.
newAssessmentMetadata :: AssessmentMetadata

-- | Specifies when the assessment was created.
assessmentMetadata_creationTime :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The overall status of the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_status :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe AssessmentStatus)

-- | The time of the most recent update.
assessmentMetadata_lastUpdated :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The roles associated with the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_roles :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe [Role])

-- | The delegations associated with the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_delegations :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe [Delegation])

-- | The name of the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_name :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The destination in which evidence reports are stored for the specified
--   assessment.
assessmentMetadata_assessmentReportsDestination :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination)

-- | The wrapper of Amazon Web Services accounts and services in scope for
--   the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_scope :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe Scope)

-- | The name of a compliance standard related to the assessment, such as
--   PCI-DSS.
assessmentMetadata_complianceType :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_id :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the assessment.
assessmentMetadata_description :: Lens' AssessmentMetadata (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.AssessmentMetadata.AssessmentMetadata


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment

-- | An entity that defines the scope of audit evidence collected by Audit
--   Manager. An Audit Manager assessment is an implementation of an Audit
--   Manager framework.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessment</a> smart constructor.
data Assessment
Assessment' :: Maybe AssessmentFramework -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AWSAccount -> Maybe AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Assessment

-- | The framework from which the assessment was created.
[$sel:framework:Assessment'] :: Assessment -> Maybe AssessmentFramework

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.
[$sel:arn:Assessment'] :: Assessment -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Services account associated with the assessment.
[$sel:awsAccount:Assessment'] :: Assessment -> Maybe AWSAccount

-- | The metadata for the specified assessment.
[$sel:metadata:Assessment'] :: Assessment -> Maybe AssessmentMetadata

-- | The tags associated with the assessment.
[$sel:tags:Assessment'] :: Assessment -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Assessment</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:framework:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_framework</a> - The
--   framework from which the assessment was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_arn</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccount:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_awsAccount</a> - The
--   Amazon Web Services account associated with the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_metadata</a> - The
--   metadata for the specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the assessment.
newAssessment :: Assessment

-- | The framework from which the assessment was created.
assessment_framework :: Lens' Assessment (Maybe AssessmentFramework)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.
assessment_arn :: Lens' Assessment (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Web Services account associated with the assessment.
assessment_awsAccount :: Lens' Assessment (Maybe AWSAccount)

-- | The metadata for the specified assessment.
assessment_metadata :: Lens' Assessment (Maybe AssessmentMetadata)

-- | The tags associated with the assessment.
assessment_tags :: Lens' Assessment (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Assessment.Assessment


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ServiceMetadata

-- | The metadata associated with the specified Amazon Web Service.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newServiceMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data ServiceMetadata
ServiceMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ServiceMetadata

-- | The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as compute,
--   storage, database, and so on.
[$sel:category:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:name:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The display name of the Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:displayName:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:description:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ServiceMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:category:ServiceMetadata'</a>, <a>serviceMetadata_category</a>
--   - The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as
--   compute, storage, database, and so on.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ServiceMetadata'</a>, <a>serviceMetadata_name</a> - The
--   name of the Amazon Web Service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:displayName:ServiceMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>serviceMetadata_displayName</a> - The display name of the Amazon
--   Web Service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ServiceMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>serviceMetadata_description</a> - The description of the specified
--   Amazon Web Service.
newServiceMetadata :: ServiceMetadata

-- | The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as compute,
--   storage, database, and so on.
serviceMetadata_category :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_name :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The display name of the Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_displayName :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_description :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings

-- | The settings object that holds all supported Audit Manager settings.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSettings</a> smart constructor.
data Settings
Settings' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe Bool -> Settings

-- | The KMS key details.
[$sel:kmsKey:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Text

-- | The default storage destination for assessment reports.
[$sel:defaultAssessmentReportsDestination:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination

-- | The designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
[$sel:snsTopic:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Text

-- | The designated default audit owners.
[$sel:defaultProcessOwners:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe [Role]

-- | Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
[$sel:isAwsOrgEnabled:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>Settings</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:kmsKey:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_kmsKey</a> - The KMS key
--   details.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultAssessmentReportsDestination:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultAssessmentReportsDestination</a> - The default
--   storage destination for assessment reports.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopic:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_snsTopic</a> - The
--   designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultProcessOwners:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultProcessOwners</a> - The designated default audit
--   owners.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isAwsOrgEnabled:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_isAwsOrgEnabled</a>
--   - Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
newSettings :: Settings

-- | The KMS key details.
settings_kmsKey :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Text)

-- | The default storage destination for assessment reports.
settings_defaultAssessmentReportsDestination :: Lens' Settings (Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination)

-- | The designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
settings_snsTopic :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Text)

-- | The designated default audit owners.
settings_defaultProcessOwners :: Lens' Settings (Maybe [Role])

-- | Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
settings_isAwsOrgEnabled :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Bool)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Settings.Settings

instance Amazonka.Data.XML.FromXML Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceFrequency.SourceFrequency

instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceFrequency.SourceFrequency
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceFrequency.SourceFrequency
instance Amazonka.Data.Headers.ToHeader Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceFrequency.SourceFrequency

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword

-- | The keyword to search for in CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security
--   Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSourceKeyword</a> smart constructor.
data SourceKeyword
SourceKeyword' :: Maybe KeywordInputType -> Maybe Text -> SourceKeyword

-- | The method of input for the specified keyword.
[$sel:keywordInputType:SourceKeyword'] :: SourceKeyword -> Maybe KeywordInputType

-- | The value of the keyword used to search CloudTrail logs, Config rules,
--   Security Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names when mapping a
--   control data source.
[$sel:keywordValue:SourceKeyword'] :: SourceKeyword -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SourceKeyword</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordInputType:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordInputType</a> - The method of input for the
--   specified keyword.
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordValue:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordValue</a> - The value of the keyword used to
--   search CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security Hub checks, and Amazon
--   Web Services API names when mapping a control data source.
newSourceKeyword :: SourceKeyword

-- | The method of input for the specified keyword.
sourceKeyword_keywordInputType :: Lens' SourceKeyword (Maybe KeywordInputType)

-- | The value of the keyword used to search CloudTrail logs, Config rules,
--   Security Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names when mapping a
--   control data source.
sourceKeyword_keywordValue :: Lens' SourceKeyword (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.SourceKeyword.SourceKeyword

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource

-- | Control mapping fields that represent the source for evidence
--   collection, along with related parameters and metadata. This does not
--   contain <tt>mappingID</tt>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateControlMappingSource</a> smart constructor.
data CreateControlMappingSource
CreateControlMappingSource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceFrequency -> Maybe SourceKeyword -> Maybe SourceSetUpOption -> CreateControlMappingSource

-- | The name of the control mapping data source.
[$sel:sourceName:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence
--   collection.
[$sel:sourceType:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceType

-- | The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.
[$sel:troubleshootingText:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the data source that determines from where Audit
--   Manager collects evidence for the control.
[$sel:sourceDescription:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping
--   source.
[$sel:sourceFrequency:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceFrequency
[$sel:sourceKeyword:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceKeyword

-- | The setup option for the data source, which reflects if the evidence
--   collection is automated or manual.
[$sel:sourceSetUpOption:CreateControlMappingSource'] :: CreateControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceSetUpOption

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateControlMappingSource</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceName:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceName</a> - The name of the control
--   mapping data source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceType:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceType</a> - Specifies one of the
--   five types of data sources for evidence collection.
--   
--   <a>$sel:troubleshootingText:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_troubleshootingText</a> - The
--   instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceDescription:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceDescription</a> - The description
--   of the data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFrequency:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceFrequency</a> - The frequency of
--   evidence collection for the specified control mapping source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceKeyword:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceKeyword</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceSetUpOption:CreateControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>createControlMappingSource_sourceSetUpOption</a> - The setup option
--   for the data source, which reflects if the evidence collection is
--   automated or manual.
newCreateControlMappingSource :: CreateControlMappingSource

-- | The name of the control mapping data source.
createControlMappingSource_sourceName :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence
--   collection.
createControlMappingSource_sourceType :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceType)

-- | The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.
createControlMappingSource_troubleshootingText :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the data source that determines from where Audit
--   Manager collects evidence for the control.
createControlMappingSource_sourceDescription :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping
--   source.
createControlMappingSource_sourceFrequency :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceFrequency)

-- | Undocumented member.
createControlMappingSource_sourceKeyword :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceKeyword)

-- | The setup option for the data source, which reflects if the evidence
--   collection is automated or manual.
createControlMappingSource_sourceSetUpOption :: Lens' CreateControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceSetUpOption)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource.CreateControlMappingSource
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource.CreateControlMappingSource
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource.CreateControlMappingSource
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource.CreateControlMappingSource
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.CreateControlMappingSource.CreateControlMappingSource

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlMappingSource

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlMappingSource</a> smart constructor.
data ControlMappingSource
ControlMappingSource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceFrequency -> Maybe SourceKeyword -> Maybe SourceSetUpOption -> ControlMappingSource

-- | The name of the specified source.
[$sel:sourceName:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence
--   collection.
[$sel:sourceType:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceType

-- | The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.
[$sel:troubleshootingText:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified source.
[$sel:sourceId:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified source.
[$sel:sourceDescription:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe Text

-- | The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping
--   source.
[$sel:sourceFrequency:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceFrequency
[$sel:sourceKeyword:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceKeyword

-- | The setup option for the data source, which reflects if the evidence
--   collection is automated or manual.
[$sel:sourceSetUpOption:ControlMappingSource'] :: ControlMappingSource -> Maybe SourceSetUpOption

-- | Create a value of <a>ControlMappingSource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceName:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceName</a> - The name of the specified
--   source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceType:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceType</a> - Specifies one of the five
--   types of data sources for evidence collection.
--   
--   <a>$sel:troubleshootingText:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_troubleshootingText</a> - The instructions for
--   troubleshooting the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceId:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceId</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   specified source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceDescription:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceDescription</a> - The description of the
--   specified source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFrequency:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceFrequency</a> - The frequency of
--   evidence collection for the specified control mapping source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceKeyword:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceKeyword</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceSetUpOption:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceSetUpOption</a> - The setup option for
--   the data source, which reflects if the evidence collection is
--   automated or manual.
newControlMappingSource :: ControlMappingSource

-- | The name of the specified source.
controlMappingSource_sourceName :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence
--   collection.
controlMappingSource_sourceType :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceType)

-- | The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.
controlMappingSource_troubleshootingText :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified source.
controlMappingSource_sourceId :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified source.
controlMappingSource_sourceDescription :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe Text)

-- | The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping
--   source.
controlMappingSource_sourceFrequency :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceFrequency)

-- | Undocumented member.
controlMappingSource_sourceKeyword :: Lens' ControlMappingSource (Maybe SourceKeyword)

--   collection is automated or manual.

instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlMappingSource.ControlMappingSource

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control

-- | A control in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControl</a> smart constructor.
data Control
Control' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlMappingSource) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ControlType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Control

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.
[$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.
[$sel:testingInformation:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.
[$sel:arn:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the control was created.
[$sel:createdAt:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
[$sel:controlMappingSources:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlMappingSource)

-- | The IAM user or role that created the control.
[$sel:createdBy:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
[$sel:actionPlanInstructions:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
[$sel:controlSources:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified control.
[$sel:name:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
[$sel:actionPlanTitle:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the control.
[$sel:id:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The type of control, such as custom or standard.
[$sel:type':Control'] :: Control -> Maybe ControlType

-- | The description of the specified control.
[$sel:description:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags associated with the control.
[$sel:tags:Control'] :: Control -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Control</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Control'</a>, <a>control_lastUpdatedBy</a> - The
--   IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:testingInformation:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_testingInformation</a> - The steps to follow to determine
--   if the control has been satisfied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Control'</a>, <a>control_lastUpdatedAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Control'</a>, <a>control_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Control'</a>, <a>control_createdAt</a> - Specifies
--   when the control was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlMappingSources:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_controlMappingSources</a> - The data mapping sources for
--   the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Control'</a>, <a>control_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that created the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanInstructions:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_actionPlanInstructions</a> - The recommended actions to
--   carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:Control'</a>, <a>control_controlSources</a> -
--   The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Control'</a>, <a>control_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanTitle:Control'</a>, <a>control_actionPlanTitle</a> -
--   The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Control'</a>, <a>control_id</a> - The unique identifier for
--   the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Control'</a>, <a>control_type</a> - The type of control,
--   such as custom or standard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Control'</a>, <a>control_description</a> - The
--   description of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Control'</a>, <a>control_tags</a> - The tags associated
--   with the control.
newControl :: Control

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.
control_lastUpdatedBy :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.
control_testingInformation :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
control_lastUpdatedAt :: Lens' Control (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.
control_arn :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the control was created.
control_createdAt :: Lens' Control (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
control_controlMappingSources :: Lens' Control (Maybe (NonEmpty ControlMappingSource))

-- | The IAM user or role that created the control.
control_createdBy :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
control_actionPlanInstructions :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
control_controlSources :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified control.
control_name :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
control_actionPlanTitle :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the control.
control_id :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The type of control, such as custom or standard.
control_type :: Lens' Control (Maybe ControlType)

-- | The description of the specified control.
control_description :: Lens' Control (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags associated with the control.
control_tags :: Lens' Control (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Control.Control


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet

-- | A set of controls in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlSet</a> smart constructor.
data ControlSet
ControlSet' :: Maybe (NonEmpty Control) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ControlSet

-- | The list of controls within the control set.
[$sel:controls:ControlSet'] :: ControlSet -> Maybe (NonEmpty Control)

-- | The name of the control set.
[$sel:name:ControlSet'] :: ControlSet -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
[$sel:id:ControlSet'] :: ControlSet -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ControlSet</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controls:ControlSet'</a>, <a>controlSet_controls</a> - The
--   list of controls within the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ControlSet'</a>, <a>controlSet_name</a> - The name of the
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ControlSet'</a>, <a>controlSet_id</a> - The identifier of
--   the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a
--   plain string format.
newControlSet :: ControlSet

-- | The list of controls within the control set.
controlSet_controls :: Lens' ControlSet (Maybe (NonEmpty Control))

-- | The name of the control set.
controlSet_name :: Lens' ControlSet (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
controlSet_id :: Lens' ControlSet (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.ControlSet.ControlSet


module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.Framework

-- | The file used to structure and automate Audit Manager assessments for
--   a given compliance standard.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFramework</a> smart constructor.
data Framework
Framework' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe FrameworkType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Framework

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
[$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
[$sel:arn:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
[$sel:createdAt:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The IAM user or role that created the framework.
[$sel:createdBy:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
[$sel:controlSets:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet)

-- | The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
[$sel:controlSources:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified framework.
[$sel:name:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
[$sel:complianceType:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified framework.
[$sel:id:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The framework type, such as custom or standard.
[$sel:type':Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe FrameworkType

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
[$sel:logo:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified framework.
[$sel:description:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags associated with the framework.
[$sel:tags:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Framework</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedBy</a> -
--   The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that created the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSets:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSets</a> - The
--   control sets associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSources</a>
--   - The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_complianceType</a>
--   - The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_id</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Framework'</a>, <a>framework_type</a> - The framework
--   type, such as custom or standard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_logo</a> - The logo
--   associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_description</a> - The
--   description of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the framework.
newFramework :: Framework

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
framework_lastUpdatedBy :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
framework_lastUpdatedAt :: Lens' Framework (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
framework_arn :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
framework_createdAt :: Lens' Framework (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The IAM user or role that created the framework.
framework_createdBy :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
framework_controlSets :: Lens' Framework (Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet))

-- | The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
framework_controlSources :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified framework.
framework_name :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
framework_complianceType :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified framework.
framework_id :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The framework type, such as custom or standard.
framework_type :: Lens' Framework (Maybe FrameworkType)

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
framework_logo :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified framework.
framework_description :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags associated with the framework.
framework_tags :: Lens' Framework (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.URL

-- | A uniform resource locator, used as a unique identifier to locate a
--   resource on the internet.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newURL</a> smart constructor.
data URL
URL' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> URL

-- | The unique identifier for the internet resource.
[$sel:link:URL'] :: URL -> Maybe Text

-- | The name or word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
[$sel:hyperlinkName:URL'] :: URL -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>URL</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:link:URL'</a>, <a>url_link</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   internet resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:hyperlinkName:URL'</a>, <a>url_hyperlinkName</a> - The name or
--   word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
newURL :: URL

-- | The unique identifier for the internet resource.
url_link :: Lens' URL (Maybe Text)

-- | The name or word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
url_hyperlinkName :: Lens' URL (Maybe Text)

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types.UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | A <tt>controlSet</tt> entity that represents a collection of controls
--   in Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet
UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet' :: Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl) -> Maybe Text -> Text -> UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

[$sel:controls:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl)

--   <a>$sel:id:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,

--   for the control set.

--   <a>$sel:name:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name</a> - The name of the
--   control set.

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Types

-- | API version <tt>2017-07-25</tt> of the Amazon Audit Manager SDK
--   configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The request has invalid or missing parameters.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Your account is not registered with Audit Manager. Check the delegated
--   administrator setup on the Audit Manager settings page, and try again.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An internal service error occurred during the processing of your
--   request. Try again later.
_InternalServerException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The resource specified in the request cannot be found.
_ResourceNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype AccountStatus
AccountStatus' :: Text -> AccountStatus
[fromAccountStatus] :: AccountStatus -> Text
pattern AccountStatus_ACTIVE :: AccountStatus
pattern AccountStatus_INACTIVE :: AccountStatus
pattern AccountStatus_PENDING_ACTIVATION :: AccountStatus
newtype ActionEnum
ActionEnum' :: Text -> ActionEnum
[fromActionEnum] :: ActionEnum -> Text
pattern ActionEnum_ACTIVE :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_CREATE :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_DELETE :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_IMPORT_EVIDENCE :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_INACTIVE :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_REVIEWED :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_UNDER_REVIEW :: ActionEnum
pattern ActionEnum_UPDATE_METADATA :: ActionEnum
newtype AssessmentReportDestinationType
AssessmentReportDestinationType' :: Text -> AssessmentReportDestinationType
[fromAssessmentReportDestinationType] :: AssessmentReportDestinationType -> Text
pattern AssessmentReportDestinationType_S3 :: AssessmentReportDestinationType
newtype AssessmentReportStatus
AssessmentReportStatus' :: Text -> AssessmentReportStatus
[fromAssessmentReportStatus] :: AssessmentReportStatus -> Text
pattern AssessmentReportStatus_COMPLETE :: AssessmentReportStatus
pattern AssessmentReportStatus_FAILED :: AssessmentReportStatus
pattern AssessmentReportStatus_IN_PROGRESS :: AssessmentReportStatus

[fromAssessmentStatus] :: AssessmentStatus -> Text
pattern AssessmentStatus_ACTIVE :: AssessmentStatus
pattern AssessmentStatus_INACTIVE :: AssessmentStatus

pattern ControlResponse_DEFER :: ControlResponse
pattern ControlResponse_IGNORE :: ControlResponse
pattern ControlResponse_MANUAL :: ControlResponse

pattern ControlSetStatus_UNDER_REVIEW :: ControlSetStatus

pattern FrameworkType_Standard :: FrameworkType

pattern KeywordInputType_SELECT_FROM_LIST :: KeywordInputType

pattern ObjectTypeEnum_ASSESSMENT :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_ASSESSMENT_REPORT :: ObjectTypeEnum
pattern ObjectTypeEnum_CONTROL :: ObjectTypeEnum

pattern ObjectTypeEnum_DELEGATION :: ObjectTypeEnum

pattern SourceSetUpOption_System_Controls_Mapping :: SourceSetUpOption

pattern SourceType_AWS_API_Call :: SourceType
