-- | The assignment of a control set to a delegate for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDelegation</a> smart constructor.
data Delegation
Delegation' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe DelegationStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Delegation

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
[$sel:roleType:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe RoleType

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
[$sel:creationTime:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the delegation.
[$sel:status:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe DelegationStatus

-- | Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdated:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The identifier for the associated control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The IAM user or role that created the delegation.
[$sel:createdBy:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
[$sel:id:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The comment related to the delegation.
[$sel:comment:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:Delegation'] :: Delegation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Delegation</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleType</a> - The
--   type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_creationTime</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_status</a> - The status
--   of the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdated:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_lastUpdated</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_controlSetId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_createdBy</a> - The
--   IAM user or role that created the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_assessmentId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comment:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_comment</a> - The
--   comment related to the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Delegation'</a>,
--   <a>delegation_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegation :: Delegation

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
delegation_roleType :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe RoleType)

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
delegation_creationTime :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the delegation.
delegation_status :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe DelegationStatus)

-- | Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
delegation_lastUpdated :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The identifier for the associated control set.
delegation_controlSetId :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The IAM user or role that created the delegation.
delegation_createdBy :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
delegation_id :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the associated assessment.
delegation_assessmentId :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The comment related to the delegation.
delegation_comment :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
delegation_roleArn :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
delegation_assessmentName :: Lens' Delegation (Maybe Text)

-- | The metadata associated with the specified delegation.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDelegationMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data DelegationMetadata
DelegationMetadata' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe DelegationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> DelegationMetadata

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
[$sel:creationTime:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the delgation.
[$sel:status:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe DelegationStatus

-- | Specifies the name of the control set delegated for review.
[$sel:controlSetName:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
[$sel:id:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:DelegationMetadata'] :: DelegationMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DelegationMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the delegation
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_status</a> - The current status of the
--   delgation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetName:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_controlSetName</a> - Specifies the name of the
--   control set delegated for review.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:DelegationMetadata'</a>, <a>delegationMetadata_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_assessmentId</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the IAM role.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:DelegationMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>delegationMetadata_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegationMetadata :: DelegationMetadata

-- | Specifies when the delegation was created.
delegationMetadata_creationTime :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The current status of the delgation.
delegationMetadata_status :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe DelegationStatus)

-- | Specifies the name of the control set delegated for review.
delegationMetadata_controlSetName :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the delegation.
delegationMetadata_id :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified assessment.
delegationMetadata_assessmentId :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
delegationMetadata_roleArn :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the associated assessment.
delegationMetadata_assessmentName :: Lens' DelegationMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | A record that contains the information needed to demonstrate
--   compliance with the requirements specified by a control. Examples of
--   evidence include change activity triggered by a user, or a system
--   configuration snapshot.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data Evidence
Evidence' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Resource] -> Maybe Text -> Evidence

-- | The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.
[$sel:time:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.
[$sel:assessmentReportSelection:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The type of automated evidence.
[$sel:evidenceByType:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
[$sel:complianceCheck:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is collected,
--   and its organization path.
[$sel:awsOrganization:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
[$sel:awsAccountId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The names and values used by the evidence event, including an
--   attribute name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value
--   (such as <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
[$sel:attributes:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
[$sel:evidenceAwsAccountId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the evidence.
[$sel:id:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
[$sel:dataSource:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.
[$sel:evidenceFolderId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the
--   evidence.
[$sel:iamId:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified evidence event.
[$sel:eventName:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.
[$sel:resourcesIncluded:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe [Resource]

-- | The Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
[$sel:eventSource:Evidence'] :: Evidence -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Evidence</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:time:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_time</a> - The timestamp that
--   represents when the evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportSelection:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_assessmentReportSelection</a> - Specifies whether the
--   evidence is included in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByType:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_evidenceByType</a> -
--   The type of automated evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceCheck:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_complianceCheck</a>
--   - The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsOrganization:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsOrganization</a>
--   - The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is
--   collected, and its organization path.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccountId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsAccountId</a> - The
--   identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_attributes</a> - The
--   names and values used by the evidence event, including an attribute
--   name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value (such as
--   <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceAwsAccountId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceAwsAccountId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_id</a> - The identifier for the
--   evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_dataSource</a> - The
--   data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceFolderId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceFolderId</a> - The identifier for the folder in
--   which the evidence is stored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iamId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_iamId</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventName:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventName</a> - The name
--   of the specified evidence event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourcesIncluded:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_resourcesIncluded</a> - The list of resources assessed to
--   generate the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventSource</a> - The
--   Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
newEvidence :: Evidence

-- | The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.
evidence_time :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Specifies whether the evidence is included in the assessment report.
evidence_assessmentReportSelection :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The type of automated evidence.
evidence_evidenceByType :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
evidence_complianceCheck :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is collected,
--   and its organization path.
evidence_awsOrganization :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
evidence_awsAccountId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The names and values used by the evidence event, including an
--   attribute name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value
--   (such as <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
evidence_attributes :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
evidence_evidenceAwsAccountId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the evidence.
evidence_id :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
evidence_dataSource :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.
evidence_evidenceFolderId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the
--   evidence.
evidence_iamId :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified evidence event.
evidence_eventName :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.
evidence_resourcesIncluded :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe [Resource])

-- | The Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
evidence_eventSource :: Lens' Evidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The file used to structure and automate Audit Manager assessments for
--   a given compliance standard.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFramework</a> smart constructor.
data Framework
Framework' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe FrameworkType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Framework

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
[$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
[$sel:arn:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
[$sel:createdAt:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The IAM user or role that created the framework.
[$sel:createdBy:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
[$sel:controlSets:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet)

-- | The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
[$sel:controlSources:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the specified framework.
[$sel:name:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
[$sel:complianceType:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the specified framework.
[$sel:id:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The framework type, such as custom or standard.
[$sel:type':Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe FrameworkType

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
[$sel:logo:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified framework.
[$sel:description:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags associated with the framework.
[$sel:tags:Framework'] :: Framework -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Framework</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedBy</a> -
--   The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that created the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSets:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSets</a> - The
--   control sets associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSources</a>
--   - The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_complianceType</a>
--   - The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_id</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Framework'</a>, <a>framework_type</a> - The framework
--   type, such as custom or standard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_logo</a> - The logo
--   associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_description</a> - The
--   description of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the framework.
newFramework :: Framework

-- | The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
framework_lastUpdatedBy :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
framework_lastUpdatedAt :: Lens' Framework (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
framework_arn :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies when the framework was created.
framework_createdAt :: Lens' Framework (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The IAM user or role that created the framework.
framework_createdBy :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The control sets associated with the framework.
framework_controlSets :: Lens' Framework (Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet))

-- | The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
framework_controlSources :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the specified framework.
framework_name :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
framework_complianceType :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the specified framework.
framework_id :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The framework type, such as custom or standard.
framework_type :: Lens' Framework (Maybe FrameworkType)

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
framework_logo :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified framework.
framework_description :: Lens' Framework (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags associated with the framework.
framework_tags :: Lens' Framework (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The metadata of a framework, such as the name, ID, description, and so
--   on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFrameworkMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data FrameworkMetadata
FrameworkMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> FrameworkMetadata

-- | The name of the framework.
[$sel:name:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The compliance standard associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS
--   or HIPAA.
[$sel:complianceType:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
[$sel:logo:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the framework.
[$sel:description:FrameworkMetadata'] :: FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>FrameworkMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_name</a> -
--   The name of the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_complianceType</a> - The compliance standard
--   associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_logo</a> -
--   The logo associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_description</a> - The description of the
--   framework.
newFrameworkMetadata :: FrameworkMetadata

-- | The name of the framework.
frameworkMetadata_name :: Lens' FrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The compliance standard associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS
--   or HIPAA.
frameworkMetadata_complianceType :: Lens' FrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The logo associated with the framework.
frameworkMetadata_logo :: Lens' FrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the framework.
frameworkMetadata_description :: Lens' FrameworkMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | Evidence that is uploaded to Audit Manager manually.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newManualEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data ManualEvidence
ManualEvidence' :: Maybe Text -> ManualEvidence

-- | The Amazon S3 URL that points to a manual evidence object.
[$sel:s3ResourcePath:ManualEvidence'] :: ManualEvidence -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ManualEvidence</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3ResourcePath:ManualEvidence'</a>,
--   <a>manualEvidence_s3ResourcePath</a> - The Amazon S3 URL that points
--   to a manual evidence object.
newManualEvidence :: ManualEvidence

-- | The Amazon S3 URL that points to a manual evidence object.
manualEvidence_s3ResourcePath :: Lens' ManualEvidence (Maybe Text)

-- | The notification used to inform a user of an update in Audit Manager.
--   For example, this includes the notification that is sent when a
--   control set is delegated for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNotification</a> smart constructor.
data Notification
Notification' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Notification

-- | Specifies the name of the control set that the notification is about.
[$sel:controlSetName:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified control set.
[$sel:controlSetId:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the notification was sent.
[$sel:eventTime:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The sender of the notification.
[$sel:source:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the notification.
[$sel:id:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the notification.
[$sel:description:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the related assessment.
[$sel:assessmentName:Notification'] :: Notification -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Notification</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetName</a> - Specifies the name of the control
--   set that the notification is about.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventTime:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_eventTime</a> -
--   The time when the notification was sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_source</a> - The
--   sender of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_description</a>
--   - The description of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentName</a> - The name of the related
--   assessment.
newNotification :: Notification

-- | Specifies the name of the control set that the notification is about.
notification_controlSetName :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified control set.
notification_controlSetId :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the notification was sent.
notification_eventTime :: Lens' Notification (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The sender of the notification.
notification_source :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique identifier for the notification.
notification_id :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
notification_assessmentId :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the notification.
notification_description :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the related assessment.
notification_assessmentName :: Lens' Notification (Maybe Text)

-- | A system asset that is evaluated in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.
data Resource
Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Resource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
[$sel:arn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The value of the specified resource.
[$sel:value:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_value</a> - The value of the
--   specified resource.
newResource :: Resource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
resource_arn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The value of the specified resource.
resource_value :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The wrapper that contains the Audit Manager role information of the
--   current user, such as the role type and IAM Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN).
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRole</a> smart constructor.
data Role
Role' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe Text -> Role

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
[$sel:roleType:Role'] :: Role -> Maybe RoleType

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:Role'] :: Role -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Role</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleType</a> - The type of
--   customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
newRole :: Role

-- | The type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
role_roleType :: Lens' Role (Maybe RoleType)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
role_roleArn :: Lens' Role (Maybe Text)

-- | The wrapper that contains the Amazon Web Services accounts and
--   services in scope for the assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScope</a> smart constructor.
data Scope
Scope' :: Maybe [AWSAccount] -> Maybe [AWSService] -> Scope

-- | The Amazon Web Services accounts included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
[$sel:awsAccounts:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe [AWSAccount]

-- | The Amazon Web Services services included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
[$sel:awsServices:Scope'] :: Scope -> Maybe [AWSService]

-- | Create a value of <a>Scope</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccounts:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsAccounts</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services accounts included in the scope of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsServices:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsServices</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services services included in the scope of the assessment.
newScope :: Scope

-- | The Amazon Web Services accounts included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
scope_awsAccounts :: Lens' Scope (Maybe [AWSAccount])

-- | The Amazon Web Services services included in the scope of the
--   assessment.
scope_awsServices :: Lens' Scope (Maybe [AWSService])

-- | The metadata associated with the specified Amazon Web Service.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newServiceMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data ServiceMetadata
ServiceMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ServiceMetadata

-- | The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as compute,
--   storage, database, and so on.
[$sel:category:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:name:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The display name of the Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:displayName:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the specified Amazon Web Service.
[$sel:description:ServiceMetadata'] :: ServiceMetadata -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ServiceMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:category:ServiceMetadata'</a>, <a>serviceMetadata_category</a>
--   - The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as
--   compute, storage, database, and so on.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ServiceMetadata'</a>, <a>serviceMetadata_name</a> - The
--   name of the Amazon Web Service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:displayName:ServiceMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>serviceMetadata_displayName</a> - The display name of the Amazon
--   Web Service.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ServiceMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>serviceMetadata_description</a> - The description of the specified
--   Amazon Web Service.
newServiceMetadata :: ServiceMetadata

-- | The category in which the Amazon Web Service belongs, such as compute,
--   storage, database, and so on.
serviceMetadata_category :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_name :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The display name of the Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_displayName :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the specified Amazon Web Service.
serviceMetadata_description :: Lens' ServiceMetadata (Maybe Text)

-- | The settings object that holds all supported Audit Manager settings.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSettings</a> smart constructor.
data Settings
Settings' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe Bool -> Settings

-- | The KMS key details.
[$sel:kmsKey:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Text

-- | The default storage destination for assessment reports.
[$sel:defaultAssessmentReportsDestination:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination

-- | The designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
[$sel:snsTopic:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Text

-- | The designated default audit owners.
[$sel:defaultProcessOwners:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe [Role]

-- | Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
[$sel:isAwsOrgEnabled:Settings'] :: Settings -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>Settings</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:kmsKey:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_kmsKey</a> - The KMS key
--   details.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultAssessmentReportsDestination:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultAssessmentReportsDestination</a> - The default
--   storage destination for assessment reports.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopic:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_snsTopic</a> - The
--   designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultProcessOwners:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultProcessOwners</a> - The designated default audit
--   owners.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isAwsOrgEnabled:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_isAwsOrgEnabled</a>
--   - Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
newSettings :: Settings

-- | The KMS key details.
settings_kmsKey :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Text)

-- | The default storage destination for assessment reports.
settings_defaultAssessmentReportsDestination :: Lens' Settings (Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination)

-- | The designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
settings_snsTopic :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Text)

-- | The designated default audit owners.
settings_defaultProcessOwners :: Lens' Settings (Maybe [Role])

-- | Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
settings_isAwsOrgEnabled :: Lens' Settings (Maybe Bool)

-- | The keyword to search for in CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security
--   Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSourceKeyword</a> smart constructor.
data SourceKeyword
SourceKeyword' :: Maybe KeywordInputType -> Maybe Text -> SourceKeyword

-- | The method of input for the specified keyword.
[$sel:keywordInputType:SourceKeyword'] :: SourceKeyword -> Maybe KeywordInputType

-- | The value of the keyword used to search CloudTrail logs, Config rules,
--   Security Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names when mapping a
--   control data source.
[$sel:keywordValue:SourceKeyword'] :: SourceKeyword -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>SourceKeyword</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordInputType:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordInputType</a> - The method of input for the
--   specified keyword.
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordValue:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordValue</a> - The value of the keyword used to
--   search CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security Hub checks, and Amazon
--   Web Services API names when mapping a control data source.
newSourceKeyword :: SourceKeyword

-- | The method of input for the specified keyword.
sourceKeyword_keywordInputType :: Lens' SourceKeyword (Maybe KeywordInputType)

-- | The value of the keyword used to search CloudTrail logs, Config rules,
--   Security Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names when mapping a
--   control data source.
sourceKeyword_keywordValue :: Lens' SourceKeyword (Maybe Text)

-- | A uniform resource locator, used as a unique identifier to locate a
--   resource on the internet.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newURL</a> smart constructor.
data URL
URL' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> URL

-- | The unique identifier for the internet resource.
[$sel:link:URL'] :: URL -> Maybe Text

-- | The name or word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
[$sel:hyperlinkName:URL'] :: URL -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>URL</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:link:URL'</a>, <a>url_link</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   internet resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:hyperlinkName:URL'</a>, <a>url_hyperlinkName</a> - The name or
--   word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
newURL :: URL

-- | The unique identifier for the internet resource.
url_link :: Lens' URL (Maybe Text)

-- | The name or word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
url_hyperlinkName :: Lens' URL (Maybe Text)

-- | A <tt>controlSet</tt> entity that represents a collection of controls
--   in Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | The list of controls contained within the control set.
[$sel:controls:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl)

-- | The unique identifier for the control set.
[$sel:id:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the control set.
[$sel:name:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'] :: UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controls:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_controls</a> - The list of
--   controls contained within the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_id</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name</a> - The name of the
--   control set.
newUpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet :: Text -> UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_controls :: Lens' UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet (Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl))

-- | The unique identifier for the control set.
updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_id :: Lens' UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the control set.
updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name :: Lens' UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet Text


-- | Tags the specified resource in Audit Manager.

[$sel:resourceArn:TagResource'] :: TagResource -> Text

[$sel:tags:TagResource'] :: TagResource -> HashMap Text Text

-- | Create a value of <a>TagResource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_resourceArn</a> -
--   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_tags</a> - The tags to
--   be associated with the resource.
newTagResource :: Text -> TagResource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.
tagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' TagResource Text

-- | The tags to be associated with the resource.
tagResource_tags :: Lens' TagResource (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Enables Audit Manager for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.RegisterAccount

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newRegisterAccount</a> smart constructor.
data RegisterAccount

-- | The KMS key details.
[$sel:kmsKey:RegisterAccount'] :: RegisterAccount -> Maybe Text

--   omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   The KMS key details.

--   <a>registerAccount_delegatedAdminAccount</a> - The delegated
--   administrator account for Audit Manager.
newRegisterAccount :: RegisterAccount

-- | Returns a list of tags for the specified resource in Audit Manager.

--   omitted.
--

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   (ARN) of the specified resource.
newListTagsForResource :: Text -> ListTagsForResource

listTagsForResource_resourceArn :: Lens' ListTagsForResource Text

data ListTagsForResourceResponse

[$sel:tags:ListTagsForResourceResponse'] :: ListTagsForResourceResponse -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

--   the <tt>ListTagsForResource</tt> API.

--   status code.

--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:GetChangeLogs'</a>, <a>getChangeLogs_nextToken</a> -
--   The pagination token used to fetch the next set of results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlId:GetChangeLogs'</a>, <a>getChangeLogs_controlId</a> -
--   The identifier for the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:GetChangeLogs'</a>, <a>getChangeLogs_maxResults</a>
--   - Represents the maximum number of results per page, or per API
--   request call.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:GetChangeLogs'</a>,
--   <a>getChangeLogs_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   assessment.
newGetChangeLogs :: Text -> GetChangeLogs

-- | The identifier for the specified control set.
getChangeLogs_controlSetId :: Lens' GetChangeLogs (Maybe Text)

-- | The pagination token used to fetch the next set of results.
getChangeLogs_nextToken :: Lens' GetChangeLogs (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified control.
getChangeLogs_controlId :: Lens' GetChangeLogs (Maybe Text)

-- | Represents the maximum number of results per page, or per API request
--   call.
getChangeLogs_maxResults :: Lens' GetChangeLogs (Maybe Natural)

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
getChangeLogs_assessmentId :: Lens' GetChangeLogs Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newGetChangeLogsResponse</a> smart constructor.

-- | Removes the specified member Amazon Web Services account as a
--   delegated administrator for Audit Manager.
--   
--   When you remove a delegated administrator from your Audit Manager
--   settings, or when you deregister a delegated administrator from
--   Organizations, you continue to have access to the evidence that you
--   previously collected under that account. However, Audit Manager will
--   stop collecting and attaching evidence to that delegated administrator
--   account moving forward.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount
DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount' :: Maybe Text -> DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount

-- | The identifier for the specified administrator account.
[$sel:adminAccountId:DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount'] :: DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:adminAccountId:DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount'</a>,
--   <a>deregisterOrganizationAdminAccount_adminAccountId</a> - The
--   identifier for the specified administrator account.
newDeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount :: DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount

-- | The identifier for the specified administrator account.
deregisterOrganizationAdminAccount_adminAccountId :: Lens' DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount (Maybe Text)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse
DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse' :: Int -> DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse'] :: DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse_httpStatus</a> - The
--   response's http status code.
newDeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse :: Int -> DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse

-- | The response's http status code.
deregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse Int
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.AuditManager.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.AuditManager.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.AuditManager.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount.DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount

-- | Creates a new custom control in Audit Manager.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.CreateControl

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateControl</a> smart constructor.
data CreateControl
CreateControl' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> NonEmpty CreateControlMappingSource -> CreateControl

-- | The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.
[$sel:testingInformation:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
[$sel:actionPlanInstructions:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
[$sel:actionPlanTitle:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the control.
[$sel:description:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags associated with the control.
[$sel:tags:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The name of the control.
[$sel:name:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> Text

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
[$sel:controlMappingSources:CreateControl'] :: CreateControl -> NonEmpty CreateControlMappingSource

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateControl</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:testingInformation:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_testingInformation</a> - The steps to follow to
--   determine if the control has been satisfied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanInstructions:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_actionPlanInstructions</a> - The recommended actions
--   to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanTitle:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_actionPlanTitle</a> - The title of the action plan
--   for remediating the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_description</a> - The description of the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:CreateControl'</a>, <a>createControl_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:CreateControl'</a>, <a>createControl_name</a> - The name
--   of the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlMappingSources:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_controlMappingSources</a> - The data mapping sources
--   for the specified control.
newCreateControl :: Text -> NonEmpty CreateControlMappingSource -> CreateControl

-- | The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.
createControl_testingInformation :: Lens' CreateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
createControl_actionPlanInstructions :: Lens' CreateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
createControl_actionPlanTitle :: Lens' CreateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the control.
createControl_description :: Lens' CreateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags associated with the control.
createControl_tags :: Lens' CreateControl (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The name of the control.
createControl_name :: Lens' CreateControl Text

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
createControl_controlMappingSources :: Lens' CreateControl (NonEmpty CreateControlMappingSource)

CreateControlResponse' :: Maybe Control -> Int -> CreateControlResponse

-- | Creates an assessment in Audit Manager.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.CreateAssessment

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateAssessment</a> smart constructor.
data CreateAssessment
CreateAssessment' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> AssessmentReportsDestination -> Scope -> [Role] -> Text -> CreateAssessment

-- | The optional description of the assessment to be created.
[$sel:description:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags associated with the assessment.
[$sel:tags:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The name of the assessment to be created.
[$sel:name:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> Text

-- | The assessment report storage destination for the specified assessment
--   that is being created.
[$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> AssessmentReportsDestination
[$sel:scope:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> Scope

-- | The list of roles for the specified assessment.
[$sel:roles:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> [Role]

-- | The identifier for the specified framework.
[$sel:frameworkId:CreateAssessment'] :: CreateAssessment -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateAssessment</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   tags associated with the assessment.

--   framework.

-- | The tags associated with the assessment.

-- | Removes a tag from a resource in Audit Manager.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.UntagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResource</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResource

[$sel:resourceArn:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> Text

-- | The name or key of the tag.
[$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> NonEmpty Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   the specified resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'</a>, <a>untagResource_tagKeys</a> - The
--   name or key of the tag.
newUntagResource :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> UntagResource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.
untagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' UntagResource Text

-- | The name or key of the tag.
untagResource_tagKeys :: Lens' UntagResource (NonEmpty Text)

--   code.

-- | Edits an Audit Manager assessment.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.UpdateAssessment

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateAssessment</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateAssessment
UpdateAssessment' :: Maybe [Role] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Scope -> UpdateAssessment

-- | The list of roles for the specified assessment.
[$sel:roles:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Maybe [Role]

-- | The description of the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentDescription:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Maybe Text

-- | The assessment report storage destination for the specified assessment
--   that is being updated.
[$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination

-- | The name of the specified assessment to be updated.
[$sel:assessmentName:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified assessment.
[$sel:assessmentId:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Text

-- | The scope of the specified assessment.
[$sel:scope:UpdateAssessment'] :: UpdateAssessment -> Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateAssessment</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roles:UpdateAssessment'</a>, <a>updateAssessment_roles</a> -
--   The list of roles for the specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentDescription:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentDescription</a> - The description of the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentReportsDestination</a> - The assessment
--   report storage destination for the specified assessment that is being
--   updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentName</a> - The name of the specified
--   assessment to be updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scope:UpdateAssessment'</a>, <a>updateAssessment_scope</a> -
--   The scope of the specified assessment.
newUpdateAssessment :: Text -> Scope -> UpdateAssessment

-- | The list of roles for the specified assessment.
updateAssessment_roles :: Lens' UpdateAssessment (Maybe [Role])

-- | The description of the specified assessment.
updateAssessment_assessmentDescription :: Lens' UpdateAssessment (Maybe Text)

-- | The assessment report storage destination for the specified assessment
--   that is being updated.
updateAssessment_assessmentReportsDestination :: Lens' UpdateAssessment (Maybe AssessmentReportsDestination)

-- | The name of the specified assessment to be updated.

-- | Updates a custom control in Audit Manager.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.UpdateControl

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateControl</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateControl
UpdateControl' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> NonEmpty ControlMappingSource -> UpdateControl

-- | The steps that to follow to determine if the control has been
--   satisfied.
[$sel:testingInformation:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
[$sel:actionPlanInstructions:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
[$sel:actionPlanTitle:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The optional description of the control.
[$sel:description:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the specified control.
[$sel:controlId:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Text

-- | The name of the control to be updated.
[$sel:name:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> Text

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
[$sel:controlMappingSources:UpdateControl'] :: UpdateControl -> NonEmpty ControlMappingSource

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateControl</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:testingInformation:UpdateControl'</a>,
--   <a>updateControl_testingInformation</a> - The steps that to follow to
--   determine if the control has been satisfied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanInstructions:UpdateControl'</a>,
--   <a>updateControl_actionPlanInstructions</a> - The recommended actions
--   to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanTitle:UpdateControl'</a>,
--   <a>updateControl_actionPlanTitle</a> - The title of the action plan
--   for remediating the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:UpdateControl'</a>,
--   <a>updateControl_description</a> - The optional description of the
--   control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlId:UpdateControl'</a>, <a>updateControl_controlId</a> -
--   The identifier for the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:UpdateControl'</a>, <a>updateControl_name</a> - The name
--   of the control to be updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlMappingSources:UpdateControl'</a>,
--   <a>updateControl_controlMappingSources</a> - The data mapping sources
--   for the specified control.
newUpdateControl :: Text -> Text -> NonEmpty ControlMappingSource -> UpdateControl

-- | The steps that to follow to determine if the control has been
--   satisfied.
updateControl_testingInformation :: Lens' UpdateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
updateControl_actionPlanInstructions :: Lens' UpdateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
updateControl_actionPlanTitle :: Lens' UpdateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The optional description of the control.
updateControl_description :: Lens' UpdateControl (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the specified control.
updateControl_controlId :: Lens' UpdateControl Text

-- | The name of the control to be updated.
updateControl_name :: Lens' UpdateControl Text

-- | The data mapping sources for the specified control.
updateControl_controlMappingSources :: Lens' UpdateControl (NonEmpty ControlMappingSource)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateControlResponse</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateControlResponse
UpdateControlResponse' :: Maybe Control -> Int -> UpdateControlResponse

-- | The name of the updated control set returned by the
--   <tt>UpdateControl</tt> API.
[$sel:control:UpdateControlResponse'] :: UpdateControlResponse -> Maybe Control

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:UpdateControlResponse'] :: UpdateControlResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateControlResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:control:UpdateControlResponse'</a>,
--   <a>updateControlResponse_control</a> - The name of the updated control
--   set returned by the <tt>UpdateControl</tt> API.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:UpdateControlResponse'</a>,
--   <a>updateControlResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newUpdateControlResponse :: Int -> UpdateControlResponse

-- | The name of the updated control set returned by the
--   <tt>UpdateControl</tt> API.
updateControlResponse_control :: Lens' UpdateControlResponse (Maybe Control)

-- | The response's http status code.
updateControlResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' UpdateControlResponse Int

-- | Updates Audit Manager settings for the current user account.

-- | Validates the integrity of an assessment report in Audit Manager.
module Amazonka.AuditManager.ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity

-- | The relative path of the specified Amazon S3 bucket in which the
--   assessment report is stored.
[$sel:s3RelativePath:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3RelativePath:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity'</a>,

--   path of the specified Amazon S3 bucket in which the assessment report
--   is stored.
newValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity :: Text -> ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity

-- | The relative path of the specified Amazon S3 bucket in which the
--   assessment report is stored.
validateAssessmentReportIntegrity_s3RelativePath :: Lens' ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse
ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Int -> ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse

-- | Specifies whether the signature key is valid.
[$sel:signatureValid:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Maybe Bool

-- | Represents any errors that occurred when validating the assessment
--   report.
[$sel:validationErrors:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The date and time signature that specifies when the assessment report
--   was created.
[$sel:signatureDateTime:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The signature algorithm used to code sign the assessment report file.
[$sel:signatureAlgorithm:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The unique identifier for the validation signature key.
[$sel:signatureKeyId:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'] :: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--

--   Represents any errors that occurred when validating the assessment
--   report.
--

--   <a>$sel:signatureDateTime:ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrityResponse'</a>,

--   The date and time signature that specifies when the assessment report
--   was created.

--

--   The signature algorithm used to code sign the assessment report file.

assessmentMetadataItem_status :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe AssessmentStatus)

--   PCI-DSS.
assessmentMetadataItem_complianceType :: Lens' AssessmentMetadataItem (Maybe Text)

module Amazonka.AuditManager.Waiters


-- | Derived from API version <tt>2017-07-25</tt> of the AWS service
--   descriptions, licensed under Apache 2.0.
--   
--   Welcome to the Audit Manager API reference. This guide is for
--   developers who need detailed information about the Audit Manager API
--   operations, data types, and errors.
--   
--   Audit Manager is a service that provides automated evidence collection
--   so that you can continuously audit your Amazon Web Services usage, and
--   assess the effectiveness of your controls to better manage risk and
--   simplify compliance.
--   
--   Audit Manager provides pre-built frameworks that structure and
--   automate assessments for a given compliance standard. Frameworks
--   include a pre-built collection of controls with descriptions and
--   testing procedures, which are grouped according to the requirements of
--   the specified compliance standard or regulation. You can also
--   customize frameworks and controls to support internal audits with
--   unique requirements.
--   
--   Use the following links to get started with the Audit Manager API:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>Actions</a>: An alphabetical list of all Audit Manager API
--   operations.</li>
--   <li><a>Data types</a>: An alphabetical list of all Audit Manager data
--   types.</li>
--   <li><a>Common parameters</a>: Parameters that all Query operations can
--   use.</li>
--   <li><a>Common errors</a>: Client and server errors that all operations
--   can return.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   If you're new to Audit Manager, we recommend that you review the
--   <a>Audit Manager User Guide</a>.
module Amazonka.AuditManager

-- | API version <tt>2017-07-25</tt> of the Amazon Audit Manager SDK
--   configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The request has invalid or missing parameters.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | Your account is not registered with Audit Manager. Check the delegated
--   administrator setup on the Audit Manager settings page, and try again.
_AccessDeniedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An internal service error occurred during the processing of your
--   request. Try again later.
_InternalServerException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The resource specified in the request cannot be found.
_ResourceNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateAssessmentReport</a> smart constructor.
data CreateAssessmentReport
CreateAssessmentReport' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> CreateAssessmentReport

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateAssessmentReport</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:CreateAssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>createAssessmentReport_description</a> - The description of the
--   assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:CreateAssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>createAssessmentReport_name</a> - The name of the new assessment
--   report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:CreateAssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>createAssessmentReport_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.

--   constructor.

--   optional fields omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   status code.

-- | Create a value of <a>RegisterOrganizationAdminAccountResponse</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateAssessment</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roles:UpdateAssessment'</a>, <a>updateAssessment_roles</a> -
--   The list of roles for the specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentDescription:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentDescription</a> - The description of the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportsDestination:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentReportsDestination</a> - The assessment
--   report storage destination for the specified assessment that is being
--   updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentName</a> - The name of the specified
--   assessment to be updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:UpdateAssessment'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessment_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:scope:UpdateAssessment'</a>, <a>updateAssessment_scope</a> -
--   The scope of the specified assessment.
newUpdateAssessment :: Text -> Scope -> UpdateAssessment

--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:CreateControl'</a>, <a>createControl_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:CreateControl'</a>, <a>createControl_name</a> - The name
--   of the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlMappingSources:CreateControl'</a>,
--   <a>createControl_controlMappingSources</a> - The data mapping sources
--   for the specified control.
newCreateControl :: Text -> NonEmpty CreateControlMappingSource -> CreateControl

-- | The wrapper of Amazon Web Services account details, such as account
--   ID, email address, and so on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAWSAccount</a> smart constructor.
data AWSAccount
AWSAccount' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AWSAccount

-- | Create a value of <a>AWSAccount</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AWSAccount'</a>, <a>aWSAccount_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:emailAddress:AWSAccount'</a>, <a>aWSAccount_emailAddress</a> -
--   The email address associated with the specified Amazon Web Services
--   account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AWSAccount'</a>, <a>aWSAccount_id</a> - The identifier for
--   the specified Amazon Web Services account.
newAWSAccount :: AWSAccount

-- | An Amazon Web Service such as Amazon S3, CloudTrail, and so on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAWSService</a> smart constructor.
data AWSService

-- | Create a value of <a>AWSService</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:serviceName:AWSService'</a>, <a>aWSService_serviceName</a> -
--   The name of the Amazon Web Service.
newAWSService :: AWSService

-- | An entity that defines the scope of audit evidence collected by Audit
--   Manager. An Audit Manager assessment is an implementation of an Audit
--   Manager framework.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessment</a> smart constructor.
data Assessment
Assessment' :: Maybe AssessmentFramework -> Maybe Text -> Maybe AWSAccount -> Maybe AssessmentMetadata -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Assessment

-- | Create a value of <a>Assessment</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:framework:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_framework</a> - The
--   framework from which the assessment was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_arn</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccount:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_awsAccount</a> - The
--   Amazon Web Services account associated with the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_metadata</a> - The
--   metadata for the specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Assessment'</a>, <a>assessment_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the assessment.
newAssessment :: Assessment

-- | The control entity that represents a standard or custom control used
--   in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentControl</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentControl

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentControl</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   generated for the control.

--   <a>assessmentControl_response</a> - The response of the specified
--   control.

--   the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportEvidenceCount:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_assessmentReportEvidenceCount</a> - The amount of
--   evidence in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentControl'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControl_description</a> - The description of the
--   specified control.
newAssessmentControl :: AssessmentControl

-- | Represents a set of controls in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentControlSet</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentControlSet
AssessmentControlSet' :: Maybe ControlSetStatus -> Maybe [AssessmentControl] -> Maybe [Role] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe [Delegation] -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentControlSet

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentControlSet</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--

--   the control set.

--   <a>assessmentControlSet_controls</a> - The list of controls contained
--   with the control set.
--

--   <a>assessmentControlSet_roles</a> - The roles associated with the
--   control set.

--   <a>assessmentControlSet_manualEvidenceCount</a> - The total number of
--   evidence objects uploaded manually to the control set.
