--   <a>assessmentControlSet_systemEvidenceCount</a> - The total number of
--   evidence objects retrieved automatically for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentControlSet'</a>, <a>assessmentControlSet_id</a> -
--   The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the
--   control set name in a plain string format.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentControlSet_description</a> - The description for the
--   control set.
newAssessmentControlSet :: AssessmentControlSet

-- | The folder in which Audit Manager stores evidence for an assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentEvidenceFolder</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentEvidenceFolder
AssessmentEvidenceFolder' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> AssessmentEvidenceFolder

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentEvidenceFolder</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount</a>
--   - The total number of issues that were reported directly from Security
--   Hub, Config, or both.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_controlSetId</a> - The identifier for the
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportSelectionCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_assessmentReportSelectionCount</a> - The
--   total count of evidence included in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:totalEvidence:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_totalEvidence</a> - The total amount of
--   evidence in the evidence folder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByTypeManualCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceByTypeManualCount</a> - The number
--   of evidence that falls under the manual category. This evidence is
--   imported manually.
--   
--   <a>$sel:date:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_date</a> - The date when the first
--   evidence was added to the evidence folder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_name</a> - The name of the specified
--   evidence folder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount</a> - The
--   number of evidence that falls under the user activity category. This
--   evidence is collected from CloudTrail logs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_controlId</a> - The unique identifier for
--   the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceAwsServiceSourceCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,

--   total number of Amazon Web Services resources assessed to generate the
--   evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:author:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_author</a> - The name of the user who
--   created the evidence folder.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_id</a> - The identifier for the folder in
--   which evidence is stored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSource:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_dataSource</a> - The Amazon Web Service
--   from which the evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlName:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_controlName</a> - The name of the control.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount</a> -
--   The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category.
--   This evidence is collected from Config or Security Hub.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByTypeConfigurationDataCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceByTypeConfigurationDataCount</a> -
--   The number of evidence that falls under the configuration data
--   category. This evidence is collected from configuration snapshots of
--   other Amazon Web Services services such as Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, or
--   IAM.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceResourcesIncludedCount:AssessmentEvidenceFolder'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentEvidenceFolder_evidenceResourcesIncludedCount</a> - The
--   amount of evidence included in the evidence folder.
newAssessmentEvidenceFolder :: AssessmentEvidenceFolder

-- | The file used to structure and automate Audit Manager assessments for
--   a given compliance standard.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentFramework</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentFramework
AssessmentFramework' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [AssessmentControlSet] -> Maybe FrameworkMetadata -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentFramework

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentFramework</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSets:AssessmentFramework'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFramework_controlSets</a> - The control sets associated
--   with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:metadata:AssessmentFramework'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentFramework_metadata</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentFramework'</a>, <a>assessmentFramework_id</a> -
--   The unique identifier for the framework.
newAssessmentFramework :: AssessmentFramework

--   for the assessment.
--

--   standard related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.

newAssessmentMetadata :: AssessmentMetadata

-- | A finalized document generated from an Audit Manager assessment. These
--   reports summarize the relevant evidence collected for your audit, and
--   link to the relevant evidence folders which are named and organized
--   according to the controls specified in your assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssessmentReport</a> smart constructor.
data AssessmentReport
AssessmentReport' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe AssessmentReportStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AssessmentReport

-- | Create a value of <a>AssessmentReport</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_creationTime</a> - Specifies when the assessment
--   report was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_status</a> -
--   The current status of the specified assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccountId:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_awsAccountId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_name</a> - The
--   name given to the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:author:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_author</a> -
--   The name of the user who created the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssessmentReport'</a>, <a>assessmentReport_id</a> - The
--   unique identifier for the specified assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_description</a> - The description of the specified
--   assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:AssessmentReport'</a>,
--   <a>assessmentReport_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newAssessmentReport :: AssessmentReport

--   type, such as Amazon S3.
newAssessmentReportsDestination :: AssessmentReportsDestination

-- | An error entity for the <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>
--   API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple
--   string message.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newBatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError</a> smart
--   constructor.
data BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError
BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError' :: Maybe CreateDelegationRequest -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError

-- | Create a value of <a>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--

--   <a>batchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError_createDelegationRequest</a>
--   - The API request to batch create delegations in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorCode:BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError'</a>,
--   <a>batchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError_errorCode</a> - The error
--   code returned by the <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt> API.
--   
--   <a>$sel:errorMessage:BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError'</a>,
--   <a>batchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError_errorMessage</a> - The error
--   message returned by the <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>
--   API.
newBatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError :: BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError

-- | An error entity for the <tt>BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment</tt>
--   API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple
--   string message.

--   constructor.

newBatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError :: BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError

newBatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError :: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlError

-- | The record of a change within Audit Manager, such as a modified
--   assessment, a delegated control set, and so on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newChangeLog</a> smart constructor.
data ChangeLog
ChangeLog' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ObjectTypeEnum -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ActionEnum -> ChangeLog

-- | Create a value of <a>ChangeLog</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectName:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_objectName</a> - The
--   name of the changelog object.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_createdAt</a> - The
--   time of creation for the changelog object.
--   
--   <a>$sel:objectType:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_objectType</a> - The
--   changelog object type, such as an assessment, control, or control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that performed the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:action:ChangeLog'</a>, <a>changeLog_action</a> - The action
--   performed.
newChangeLog :: ChangeLog

-- | A control in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControl</a> smart constructor.
data Control
Control' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlMappingSource) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ControlType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Control

-- | Create a value of <a>Control</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Control'</a>, <a>control_lastUpdatedBy</a> - The
--   IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:testingInformation:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_testingInformation</a> - The steps to follow to determine
--   if the control has been satisfied.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Control'</a>, <a>control_lastUpdatedAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the control was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Control'</a>, <a>control_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Control'</a>, <a>control_createdAt</a> - Specifies
--   when the control was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlMappingSources:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_controlMappingSources</a> - The data mapping sources for
--   the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Control'</a>, <a>control_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that created the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanInstructions:Control'</a>,
--   <a>control_actionPlanInstructions</a> - The recommended actions to
--   carry out if the control is not fulfilled.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:Control'</a>, <a>control_controlSources</a> -
--   The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Control'</a>, <a>control_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionPlanTitle:Control'</a>, <a>control_actionPlanTitle</a> -
--   The title of the action plan for remediating the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Control'</a>, <a>control_id</a> - The unique identifier for
--   the control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Control'</a>, <a>control_type</a> - The type of control,
--   such as custom or standard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Control'</a>, <a>control_description</a> - The
--   description of the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Control'</a>, <a>control_tags</a> - The tags associated
--   with the control.
newControl :: Control

-- | A comment posted by a user on a control. This includes the author's

--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlComment</a> smart constructor.

--   posted.

--   <a>controlComment_commentBody</a> - The body text of a control
--   comment.
newControlComment :: ControlComment

-- | The data source that determines from where Audit Manager collects
--   evidence for the control.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newControlMappingSource</a> smart constructor.
data ControlMappingSource
ControlMappingSource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SourceFrequency -> Maybe SourceKeyword -> Maybe SourceSetUpOption -> ControlMappingSource

-- | Create a value of <a>ControlMappingSource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--

--   fields.

--   source.
--

--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceType</a> - Specifies one of the five
--   types of data sources for evidence collection.
--   
--   <a>$sel:troubleshootingText:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_troubleshootingText</a> - The instructions for
--   troubleshooting the specified control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceId:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceId</a> - The unique identifier for the
--   specified source.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceDescription:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceDescription</a> - The description of the
--   specified source.
--

--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceFrequency</a> - The frequency of
--   evidence collection for the specified control mapping source.

--   <a>$sel:sourceKeyword:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceKeyword</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceSetUpOption:ControlMappingSource'</a>,
--   <a>controlMappingSource_sourceSetUpOption</a> - The setup option for
--   the data source, which reflects if the evidence collection is
--   automated or manual.
newControlMappingSource :: ControlMappingSource

-- | A collection of attributes used to create a delegation for an
--   assessment in Audit Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateDelegationRequest</a> smart constructor.
data CreateDelegationRequest
CreateDelegationRequest' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> CreateDelegationRequest

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateDelegationRequest</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_roleType</a> - The type of customer
--   persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_controlSetId</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comment:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_comment</a> - A comment related to the
--   delegation request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:CreateDelegationRequest'</a>,
--   <a>createDelegationRequest_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the IAM role.
newCreateDelegationRequest :: CreateDelegationRequest

-- | The assignment of a control set to a delegate for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDelegation</a> smart constructor.
data Delegation
Delegation' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe DelegationStatus -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Delegation

-- | Create a value of <a>Delegation</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleType</a> - The
--   type of customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_creationTime</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_status</a> - The status
--   of the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdated:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_lastUpdated</a> -
--   Specifies when the delegation was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_controlSetId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_createdBy</a> - The
--   IAM user or role that created the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_assessmentId</a> -
--   The identifier for the associated assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:comment:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_comment</a> - The
--   comment related to the delegation.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Delegation'</a>, <a>delegation_roleArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Delegation'</a>,
--   <a>delegation_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegation :: Delegation

--

data DelegationMetadata

--   <a>delegationMetadata_assessmentName</a> - The name of the associated
--   assessment.
newDelegationMetadata :: DelegationMetadata

-- | A record that contains the information needed to demonstrate
--   compliance with the requirements specified by a control. Examples of
--   evidence include change activity triggered by a user, or a system
--   configuration snapshot.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data Evidence
Evidence' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Resource] -> Maybe Text -> Evidence

-- | Create a value of <a>Evidence</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:time:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_time</a> - The timestamp that
--   represents when the evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentReportSelection:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_assessmentReportSelection</a> - Specifies whether the
--   evidence is included in the assessment report.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceByType:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_evidenceByType</a> -
--   The type of automated evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceCheck:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_complianceCheck</a>
--   - The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance
--   check category. For evidence collected from Security Hub, a
--   <i>Pass</i> or <i>Fail</i> result is shown. For evidence collected
--   from Config, a <i>Compliant</i> or <i>Noncompliant</i> result is
--   shown.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsOrganization:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsOrganization</a>
--   - The Amazon Web Services account from which the evidence is
--   collected, and its organization path.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccountId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_awsAccountId</a> - The
--   identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attributes:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_attributes</a> - The
--   names and values used by the evidence event, including an attribute
--   name (such as <tt>allowUsersToChangePassword</tt>) and value (such as
--   <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>).
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceAwsAccountId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceAwsAccountId</a> - The identifier for the
--   specified Amazon Web Services account.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_id</a> - The identifier for the
--   evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_dataSource</a> - The
--   data source from which the specified evidence was collected.
--   
--   <a>$sel:evidenceFolderId:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_evidenceFolderId</a> - The identifier for the folder in
--   which the evidence is stored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:iamId:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_iamId</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventName:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventName</a> - The name
--   of the specified evidence event.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourcesIncluded:Evidence'</a>,
--   <a>evidence_resourcesIncluded</a> - The list of resources assessed to
--   generate the evidence.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventSource:Evidence'</a>, <a>evidence_eventSource</a> - The
--   Amazon Web Service from which the evidence is collected.
newEvidence :: Evidence

-- | The file used to structure and automate Audit Manager assessments for
--   a given compliance standard.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFramework</a> smart constructor.
data Framework
Framework' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (NonEmpty ControlSet) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe FrameworkType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Framework

-- | Create a value of <a>Framework</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedBy</a> -
--   The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_lastUpdatedAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdAt:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdAt</a> -
--   Specifies when the framework was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:createdBy:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_createdBy</a> - The IAM
--   user or role that created the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSets:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSets</a> - The
--   control sets associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSources:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_controlSources</a>
--   - The sources from which Audit Manager collects evidence for the
--   control.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_name</a> - The name of the
--   specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_complianceType</a>
--   - The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as
--   CIS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_id</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Framework'</a>, <a>framework_type</a> - The framework
--   type, such as custom or standard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_logo</a> - The logo
--   associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_description</a> - The
--   description of the specified framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Framework'</a>, <a>framework_tags</a> - The tags
--   associated with the framework.
newFramework :: Framework

-- | The metadata of a framework, such as the name, ID, description, and so
--   on.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFrameworkMetadata</a> smart constructor.
data FrameworkMetadata
FrameworkMetadata' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> FrameworkMetadata

-- | Create a value of <a>FrameworkMetadata</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_name</a> -
--   The name of the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:complianceType:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_complianceType</a> - The compliance standard
--   associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS or HIPAA.
--   
--   <a>$sel:logo:FrameworkMetadata'</a>, <a>frameworkMetadata_logo</a> -
--   The logo associated with the framework.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:FrameworkMetadata'</a>,
--   <a>frameworkMetadata_description</a> - The description of the
--   framework.
newFrameworkMetadata :: FrameworkMetadata

-- | Evidence that is uploaded to Audit Manager manually.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newManualEvidence</a> smart constructor.
data ManualEvidence

-- | Create a value of <a>ManualEvidence</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3ResourcePath:ManualEvidence'</a>,

--   to a manual evidence object.
newManualEvidence :: ManualEvidence

-- | The notification used to inform a user of an update in Audit Manager.
--   For example, this includes the notification that is sent when a
--   control set is delegated for review.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNotification</a> smart constructor.
data Notification
Notification' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Notification

-- | Create a value of <a>Notification</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetName</a> - Specifies the name of the control
--   set that the notification is about.
--   
--   <a>$sel:controlSetId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_controlSetId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:eventTime:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_eventTime</a> -
--   The time when the notification was sent.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_source</a> - The
--   sender of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_id</a> - The unique
--   identifier for the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentId:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentId</a> - The identifier for the specified
--   assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Notification'</a>, <a>notification_description</a>
--   - The description of the notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assessmentName:Notification'</a>,
--   <a>notification_assessmentName</a> - The name of the related
--   assessment.
newNotification :: Notification

-- | A system asset that is evaluated in an Audit Manager assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.
data Resource
Resource' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Resource

-- | Create a value of <a>Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) for the specified resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_value</a> - The value of the
--   specified resource.
newResource :: Resource

-- | The wrapper that contains the Audit Manager role information of the
--   current user, such as the role type and IAM Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN).
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRole</a> smart constructor.
data Role
Role' :: Maybe RoleType -> Maybe Text -> Role

-- | Create a value of <a>Role</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleType:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleType</a> - The type of
--   customer persona.
--   
--   In <tt>CreateAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>UpdateSettings</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can only be
--   <tt>PROCESS_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   In <tt>BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment</tt>, <tt>roleType</tt> can
--   only be <tt>RESOURCE_OWNER</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Role'</a>, <a>role_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the IAM role.
newRole :: Role

-- | The wrapper that contains the Amazon Web Services accounts and
--   services in scope for the assessment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScope</a> smart constructor.
data Scope
Scope' :: Maybe [AWSAccount] -> Maybe [AWSService] -> Scope

-- | Create a value of <a>Scope</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsAccounts:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsAccounts</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services accounts included in the scope of the assessment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:awsServices:Scope'</a>, <a>scope_awsServices</a> - The Amazon
--   Web Services services included in the scope of the assessment.
newScope :: Scope

-- | The settings object that holds all supported Audit Manager settings.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSettings</a> smart constructor.
data Settings

-- | Create a value of <a>Settings</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:kmsKey:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_kmsKey</a> - The KMS key
--   details.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultAssessmentReportsDestination:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultAssessmentReportsDestination</a> - The default
--   storage destination for assessment reports.
--   
--   <a>$sel:snsTopic:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_snsTopic</a> - The
--   designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultProcessOwners:Settings'</a>,
--   <a>settings_defaultProcessOwners</a> - The designated default audit
--   owners.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isAwsOrgEnabled:Settings'</a>, <a>settings_isAwsOrgEnabled</a>
--   - Specifies whether Organizations is enabled.
newSettings :: Settings

-- | The keyword to search for in CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security
--   Hub checks, and Amazon Web Services API names.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newSourceKeyword</a> smart constructor.
data SourceKeyword
SourceKeyword' :: Maybe KeywordInputType -> Maybe Text -> SourceKeyword

-- | Create a value of <a>SourceKeyword</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordInputType:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordInputType</a> - The method of input for the
--   specified keyword.
--   
--   <a>$sel:keywordValue:SourceKeyword'</a>,
--   <a>sourceKeyword_keywordValue</a> - The value of the keyword used to
--   search CloudTrail logs, Config rules, Security Hub checks, and Amazon
--   Web Services API names when mapping a control data source.
newSourceKeyword :: SourceKeyword

-- | A uniform resource locator, used as a unique identifier to locate a
--   resource on the internet.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newURL</a> smart constructor.

--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   internet resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:hyperlinkName:URL'</a>, <a>url_hyperlinkName</a> - The name or
--   word used as a hyperlink to the URL.
newURL :: URL

-- | A <tt>controlSet</tt> entity that represents a collection of controls
--   in Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet
UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet' :: Maybe (NonEmpty CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl) -> Maybe Text -> Text -> UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:controls:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_controls</a> - The list of
--   controls contained within the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_id</a> - The unique identifier
--   for the control set.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet'</a>,
--   <a>updateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet_name</a> - The name of the
--   control set.
newUpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet :: Text -> UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet
